programme.desc: Ryder and the team clean up a small oil spill in the water near Adventure Bay, and must plug a hole in the ship, get rid of the slick and save the wildlife all at once.(n)

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines
programme.desc: The trucks are put into teams of two for a race, but Pickle feels rejected when Crusher chooses another partner.(n)

programme.title: Noddy: Toyland Detective
programme.sub-title: Noddy and the Case of Smartysaurus's Rainbow Experiment.
programme.desc: When Smartysaurus' latest experiment sees her attempt to make a rainbow, something goes wrong and Noddy needs to investigate.(n)

programme.title: Ben and Holly's Little Kingdom
programme.desc: The duo befriend a caterpillar who wishes she could fly, and King Thistle advises them to fatten her up.(n)

programme.title: Shimmer and Shine
programme.desc: The genie duo conjure up a real alien for Leah and Zac to play with, but end up stranding the extra-terrestrial on Earth when they wreck its ship while taking it out for a spin.(n)

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Mummy Pig, Peppa and George plan a surprise for Daddy's birthday.(n)

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Zoe Zebra has a sleepover at Peppa's house.(n)

programme.title: Ben and Holly's Little Kingdom
programme.desc: Holly is left in charge of Little Kingdom while the king and queen are away.(n)

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
programme.desc: Michelangelo befriends some odd, new superheroes named Wingnut and Screwloose.(n)

programme.title: Access
programme.desc: Showbiz news and gossip.(n)

programme.title: Police Interceptors: Takedown with Vinnie Jones
programme.desc: Footballer-turned-action movie star Vinnie Jones joins up with high-speed police interception units from two forces as they battle against crime on the frontline. In this edition, Vinnie helps the Dragoon unit carry out surveillance on a target with more than a hundred convictions to his name.(n)

programme.title: Police Interceptors
programme.desc: Mark gets lucky when a car thief crosses paths with him, there is a high-speed pursuit through Lincoln city centre, and a member of the public helps the interceptors track down a drunk driver. Elsewhere, Jon Peacock gets an unusual request and Jon Moon has an encounter with a surprising lawbreaker.(n)

programme.title: Police Interceptors
programme.desc: Jon Moon and his dog Kanto are hot on the heels of some burglary suspects, while spot-checks by the unit on the A1 turn up a carrier bag full of cash. Jason Baxter rushes to the scene of an accident where the driver was thrown clear of the car, only for another crash to take place - this time involving a line of vehicles.(n)

programme.title: On Benefits
programme.sub-title: On Benefits: Life on the Dole.
programme.desc: People who rely on benefits for a place to live, including Gloucester couple Anne-Marie and Shaun, who have a four-bedroom house and describe themselves as on the work scrapheap because of their health issues, and it is important to them that they qualify for more sickness and disability benefits to go towards their household budget. Plus, house-proud Shelley, who swapped her housing association property to let a family have her two-bedroom flat and avoid paying the bedroom tax.(n)

programme.title: On Benefits
programme.sub-title: On Benefits: Life on the Dole.
programme.desc: People facing benefit problems in Wales, including a Tredegar man who bemoans the lack of opportunities in the Valleys and a Newport woman who wants a new flat and is thinking about having a baby - but needs a loan before any of that can happen. Plus, a man who had a successful business but lost everything. After a spell of homelessness, he now has a place to call home.(n)

programme.title: On Benefits
programme.sub-title: On Benefits: Life on the Dole.
programme.desc: Documentary about people living on benefits. Lisa spent seven years in prison for smuggling cocaine, and has been unemployed and on benefits ever since. James is dyslexic and surviving on only £13,000 a year, while Jai quit his job to move to the Scottish Highlands, where he has found little need for his benefit money.(n)

programme.title: Nightmare Tenants, Slum Landlords
programme.desc: Documentary highlighting alarming tales from all sides of the buy-to-let system, drawing attention to stories of unruly tenants who refuse to pay their dues and rogue landlords who have failed to live up to their responsibilities. The series also turns the spotlight on dishonest letting agents who have taken advantage of their position of trust to profit at the expense of both property owners and their tenants.(n)

programme.title: Can't Pay? We'll Take It Away
programme.desc: High Court enforcement agents Paul Bohill and Steve Pinner are in Birmingham on a potentially dangerous, full-scale eviction of a large traveller community. Meanwhile, in London's diamond district Brian O'Shaughnessy and Delroy Anglin are chasing nearly £6,000 owed by a jeweller to an unhappy customer, although a solicitor tries to convince Delroy his client owes nothing.(n)

programme.title: Can't Pay? We'll Take It Away
programme.desc: Agents chase more than £1,700 in unpaid parking fines in south-east London, but struggle to pinpoint the debtor. Meanwhile, officers in north Wales try to recover the £2,000 owed by a tradesman to a former employer, and in Kent agents chase £8,000 owed by a jewellery shop to two former employees.(n)

programme.title: NCIS: Los Angeles
programme.desc: Part one of two. Kensi is taken into custody as chief suspect in the murder of Marine Sergeant Chris Black, but fancies her chances of catching the real killer herself. Meanwhile, Callen and the rest of the team work to prove their colleague's innocence. Crime drama, starring Daniela Ruah and Chris O'Donnell.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Sarah Porter, the Secretary of the Navy, learns her daughter has been kidnapped, and the NCIS crew teams up with the FBI to track the case, determine a motive and bring the abducted girl home. Meanwhile, McGee's childhood friend, NCIS Special Agent Valerie Page, arrives in town to assist with advanced tactics training. Naval crime drama, guest starring Leslie Hope and Christina Chang.(n)

programme.title: 5 News Weekend
programme.desc: Round-up of the day's headlines from around the world.(n)

programme.title: Football on 5: The Championship
programme.desc: George Riley and Lynsey Hipgrave introduce highlights from the weekend's games in the Championship, including Norwich City v Reading at Carrow Road, Leeds United v Preston North End at Elland Road and Sheffield Wednesday v Newcastle United at Hillsborough.(n)

programme.title: Football on 5: Goal Rush
programme.desc: George Riley and Lynsey Hipgrave introduce all the goals from the weekend's games in Leagues One and Two, including AFC Wimbledon v Bristol Rovers and Blackpool v Grimsby Town.(n)

programme.title: The Funny Thing About..
programme.sub-title: The Funny Side of Love and Sex.
programme.desc: Johnny Vegas, Anthea Turner, Vanessa Feltz, Carl Fogarty, Nish Kumar and Nina Wadia are joined by a selection of British comedy stars to share their thoughts on the many weird habits, off-putting quirks and wild eccentricities people are willing to put up with while `in relationships'. Through honest confessionals and witty anecdotes, the assembled talking heads ask how people even know they are officially an item, and celebrate some of the more endearing romantic gestures that come along with the inconveniences of sharing a life with someone else.(n)

programme.title: Comedy Bigmouths
programme.desc: Ian Stone introduces a stand-up performance by the writer and comedian on topical themes.(n)

programme.title: Access
programme.desc: Showbiz news and gossip.(n)

programme.title: Reindeer Games
programme.desc: Upon release from jail, a con adopts his dead ex-cellmate's identity just to meet the man's girlfriend - but the girl's brother had plans to use the dead con's expert knowledge in a casino robbery, and the imposter is forced to take part. Also known as Reindeer Games(n)

programme.title: On Deadly Ground
programme.desc: Forrest Taft works for Aegis oil company in Alaska. The company's corrupt CEO, Michael Jennings doesn't care whether or not oil spills into the ocean or onto the land as long as it's making money for him. He even makes commercials that make him look like he cares for the environment. When Taft's best friend Hugh Palmer hides a computer disk that Jennings needs, Jennings sees Hugh as a major threat, and has Hugh murdered(n)

programme.title: The Darkness
programme.desc: During a family camping trip at the Grand Canyon, a young boy (David Mazouz) stumbles upon an ancient Native American burial ground. He takes five sacred stones from there back to his suburban home, unaware that they contain a malevolent supernatural force. This tale of terror was directed by Wolf Creek's Greg McLean. Kevin Bacon, Radha Mitchell, and Lucy Fry star in a Blumhouse Productions film(n)

programme.title: Sweet November
programme.desc: Keanu Reeves and Charlize Theron shine in this romance about a workaholic who falls for an eccentric woman. Sara (Theron) convinces Nelson (Reeves) that his fast-paced life is unsatisfying and invites him to live with her for a month so she can enlighten him. Greg Germann, Liam Aiken, Lauren Graham(n)

programme.title: Waterworld
programme.desc: Big-budget action fantasy about the battle for survival in a world where dry land has disappeared with the melting of the polar ice caps. One man, who has become amphibious, tries to protect survivors on an artificial atoll made from scrap metal by taking on a gang of marauding pirates. He is also bent on discovering whether there is any truth in the myth that there is still some land left above water(n)

programme.title: Death Race
programme.desc: Jason Statham leads the cast of this high-octane action-thriller set in the post-industrial wasteland of tomorrow, with the world's most brutal sporting event as its backdrop. A penitentiary full of felons has inspired the jailers to create a grisly pastime ripe for lucrative kickbacks. Now, adrenalised inmates, a global audience hungry for televised violence and a spectacular arena come together to form the Death Race. From expert action director Paul W.S. Anderson and the producers of Mission: Impossible comes Death Race! The stakes don't get any higher than this!(n)

programme.title: Rush Hour 3
programme.desc: In this third installment of the popular action comedy franchise, LAPD Detective James Carter (Chris Tucker) and Chief Inspector Lee (Jackie Chan) discover that Chinese Triads have extended their criminal influence to the City of Lights. They book a flight for Europe and prepare to clean up the Paris streets(n)

programme.title: The Cotton Club
programme.desc: Richard Gere stars in this crime-drama based on the famous Harlem night club. A musician works with mobsters to advance his career but falls in love with the girlfriend of a gangland kingpin(n)

programme.title: The 33
programme.desc: Based on a true event, the film follows the 2010 mining disaster incident where a group of thirty-three miners were trapped inside the San Jose mine in Chile for more than two months after a gold and copper mine collapses(n)

programme.title: The Strangers
programme.desc: A young couple staying at a remote holiday spot are terrorized by masked intruders(n)

programme.title: The Purge: Election Year
programme.desc: In the nerve-shredding third installment of this horror series about a night when all crime is legal, an ex-cop who refused to murder his son's killer must now act as the head of security for a presidential candidate who wants to end "the Purge."(n)

programme.title: Minority Report
programme.desc: In the future, criminals are arrested before they have even committed their crime, thanks to the forecasting of 'pre-cogs'. Detective John Anderton thinks the system is perfect... until he's arrested. Brilliant sci-fi thriller based on a story by Philip K Dick(n)

programme.title: Furious 7
programme.desc: Dominic Toretto and his tight-knit gang of street racers must battle the brother of a defeated nemesis and rescue a software genius from terrorists. The film is dedicated to series regular Paul Walker, who died halfway through production(n)

programme.title: Mechanic: Resurrection
programme.desc: A hit man is forced to commit three difficult killings in order to rescue his kidnapped lover(n)

programme.title: San Andreas
programme.desc: A helicopter pilot races to rescue his daughter and estranged wife as a series of massive earthquakes devastate California. Meanwhile, a Cal Tech professor attempts to warn other citizens(n)

programme.title: The Birdcage
programme.desc: Amusing comedy about a gay couple forced to pretend they are straight when the son of one of them brings his future parents-in-law for a visit. The flamboyant owner of a Miami nightclub and his drag-queen partner attempt to tone down their extravagant lifestyle before the ultra- conservative Senator and his wife arrive, with hilarious consequences(n)

programme.title: Austin Powers: The Spy Who Shagged Me
programme.desc: In this second film starring Austin Powers (Mike Myers) -the most indiscreet secret agent on the planet-, the diabolical Dr. Evil (also Myers) once again puts his evil plans into action: using a time machine, he travels back to the year 1969 and steals Austin's mojo (sex appeal). Without his mojo, the agent will not be strong enough to prevent the villain from firing a laser on the Earth. Although disheartened, Austin also travels in time and discovers that the criminal now has new allies -such as the dwarf clone, Mini-Mim (Verne Troyer) and the repugnant Igor Dan (once again, Myers). With the help of the beautiful agent, Felicity Fasobem (Heather Graham), Austin must strive to defeat the enemy and recover his vitality. The film features special performances by Woody Harrelson and musicians Willie Nelson and Elvis Costello(n)

programme.title: Popstar: Never Stop Never Stopping
programme.desc: A hugely popular rapper faces a career meltdown when his latest album tanks and his attempts to rehab his image only end in disaster. In time, he considers reuniting with his old rap trio, the Style Boyz(n)

programme.title: The Intern
programme.desc: A 70-year-old widower comes out of retirement to take an internship at a trendy start-up fashion company, and unexpectedly becomes a confidant for the overwhelmed young CEO(n)

programme.title: A Beautiful Mind
programme.desc: Russell Crowe stars as maths genius John Nash, who finds that paranoia and schizophrenia are problems he may never solve. Acclaimed drama. Mature themes/flashing images. (2001)(136 mins)(n)

programme.title: Jurassic World
programme.desc: Twenty-two years after Jurassic Park opened on Isla Nubar, a dinosaur-themed resort attracts thousands of visitors each year, just as John Hammond envisioned. However, following a bad sag in turnout a new effort is undertaken to revitalize Jurassic World, but once again mankind's attempts to interfere with nature bring ominous results(n)

programme.title: The Maze Runner: The Scorch Trials
programme.desc: Thomas and the other Gladers journey across a brutal, obstacle-filled wasteland called the Scorch. Along the way, they search for information regarding the mysterious organization known as WCKD(n)

programme.title: We Were Soldiers
programme.desc: Picked to lead the first US troops into Vietnam, Lt Col Hal Moore drills his boys in preparation for battle. But Moore isn't just a soldier: he is a son, a husband and a father. And each of the men under his command bring their own fears and families to the battle. A moving wartime actioner(n)

programme.title: The Man Without a Face
programme.desc: Compelling drama about a former teacher who has been a recluse since being disfigured in an accident. He is befriended by a lonely 12-year-old boy, who seeks the teacher's help in qualifying for the military academy attended by his late father(n)

programme.title: The Purge: Election Year
programme.desc: In the nerve-shredding third installment of this horror series about a night when all crime is legal, an ex-cop who refused to murder his son's killer must now act as the head of security for a presidential candidate who wants to end "the Purge."(n)

programme.title: The Order
programme.desc: Heath Ledger stars as a renegade Catholic priest who uncovers a dark secret in the Church while investigating the death of his mentor in this spine-tingling religious thriller. The script was written by director Brian Helgeland, who penned the Oscar-winning "L.A. Confidential." He also worked with Ledger and costars Shannyn Sossamon and Mark Addy in "A Knight's Tale." Benno Furmann, Peter Weller, Francesco Carnelutti(n)

programme.title: The Dead Pool
programme.desc: Action drama in which Dirty' Harry Callahan returns to investigate an underground betting ring in which the participants gamble on the deaths of prominent San Francisco citizens. One such dead pool' list contains the names of a rock star, a film critic and a talk-show host, all of whom have been systematically murdered. As Callahan looks further into the murders, he finds another well-known name on the list - his own(n)

programme.desc: The trio of motoring enthusiasts embark on another epic road trip, this time across western America in front-engined supercars. Jeremy Clarkson pilots the Lexus LFA, which has a spectacularly high-revving V10 powerplant, Richard Hammond gets behind the wheel of the muscular Dodge Viper, and James May opts for the latest incarnation of Aston Martin's Vanquish. On their journey from Las Vegas to Palm Springs via Los Angeles, the presenters tackle racing circuits and find themselves in a race against the police, before rushing to the Mexican border - and there's a terrifying penalty for the last man to arrive. programme.title: The Wonder of Animals
programme.desc: Chris Packham narrates the amazing work of ants and explains how they have worked together to achieve global success.(n)

programme.title: Secrets of the Earth
programme.desc: Steamy underworlds hiding mysterious treasures, extreme waters teeming with unique life, and jarring rock formations made of frozen lava.(n)

programme.title: Secrets of the Earth
programme.desc: Amazing secrets of how rain is made - some raindrops form around micrometeorites from space, while others are created by bacteria floating into the upper atmosphere.(n)

programme.title: How Earth Made Us
programme.desc: Having documented the planetary forces that have shaped the development of civilisations, Iain Stewart discovers how this relationship has been reciprocated. He examines how the advent of farming prevented the world from slipping into a new ice age, and demonstrates why humanity unwittingly caused a catastrophic mudslide in Indonesia. Last in the series.(n)

programme.title: Life in the Undergrowth
programme.desc: David Attenborough explores how insects compensate for their small size by banding together in vast numbers. He reveals that the operations of many of these societies are so finely tuned they appear to work as a single entity. Footage shows how African termite mounds act as huge ventilation systems of such sophistication that humans are only now beginning to unravel the mechanics of the structure.(n)

programme.title: The Wonder of Animals
programme.desc: Chris Packham narrates the amazing work of ants and explains how they have worked together to achieve global success.(n)

programme.title: So You Think You'd Survive
programme.desc: Frostbite, wildfires, extreme fog, strong underwater currents, bear attacks and being trapped in a sinking car are considered.(n)

programme.title: Super Giant Animals
programme.desc: Steve Backshall travels across the world to encounter the largest animals he can find and discover the remarkable things their size enables them to do. Highlights include Steve swimming with Nile crocodiles in Botswana, dodging two-ton elephant seals in California and diving with sperm whales in the Caribbean.(n)

programme.title: David Attenborough's Natural Curiosities
programme.desc: Naturalist David Attenborough shines the spotlight on some of nature's evolutionary anomalies and how these curious animals continue to baffle and fascinate. In this edition, he examines the unusual ways in which Komodo dragons and aphids reproduce.(n)

programme.title: David Attenborough's Natural Curiosities
programme.desc: Naturalist David Attenborough explores animal oddities, looking at two different animals with curiously distinctive evolutionary quirks, linked together by a common theme. In this instalment, he examines how hedgehogs and rhinos have developed protective skins.(n)

programme.title: David Attenborough's Natural Curiosities
programme.desc: David Attenborough examines the vision in squid and owls, which have both developed incredible adaptations to help them navigate at night.(n)

programme.title: David Attenborough's Natural Curiosities
programme.desc: David Attenborough takes a look at animals that rely on other species, from cuckoos planting their eggs in other birds' nests to the death's-head hawkmoth stealing honey.(n)

programme.title: David Attenborough's Natural Curiosities
programme.desc: David Attenborough takes a look at gorillas and vampire bats, two species that have unfairly gained unpleasant reputation within the animal kingdom.(n)

programme.title: David Attenborough's Natural Curiosities
programme.desc: The veteran naturalist reflects on the remarkable abilities that some plants and animals possess, such as the electric eel that helped inspire the battery and flowers that `talk' to bees using electrical signals.(n)

programme.title: Frozen Planet
programme.sub-title: To the Ends of the Earth.
programme.desc: David Attenborough travels to the Arctic and Antarctic to explore the wildernesses at Earth's poles, investigating the wildlife and geographical features found there. He begins by travelling to the North Pole, where two polar bears reveal a surprisingly tender side to their characters, before heading to the South Pole - 100 years after Roald Amundsen and Robert Falcon Scott first reached it.(n)

programme.title: Frozen Planet
programme.desc: A polar bear hunts with her cubs, while the warmer weather of spring accelerates a process that will eventually see an area of ice the size of Australia disappear into the Arctic Ocean. A woolly bear caterpillar emerges from the snow after spending the winter frozen, and in Antarctica male Adelie penguins arrive to begin constructing nests in fierce storms as they try to attract mates.(n)

programme.title: Frozen Planet
programme.desc: How animals in the polar regions adapt to the summer weather. In a colony of 400,000 king penguins the adults go surfing and the chicks take mud-baths to cool off, while polar bear cubs take their first swimming lessons as the ice they inhabit melts away. A minke whale is hunted by a family of killer whales, succumbing to their battering after two hours, and Adelie penguins try to prevent their chicks being snatched by skuas.(n)

programme.title: Leaving Las Vegas
programme.desc: Nicolas Cage's Oscar winning performance in Mike Figgis' film sees Cage as a scriptwriter who's in love with the bottle. Taking his payoff, he heads to Las Vegas, where life (and booze) can be enjoyed 24 hours a day. Co-starring Elisabeth Shue as the hooker he falls for, this is by turn bleak and moving, as Cage's slow, awful self-knowing self-destruction becomes both his reason for living and his reason for dying(n)

programme.title: Total Recall
programme.desc: Sci-fi actioner about a man who doubts his identity when he starts remembering a series of repressed memories about Mars, a planet he thinks he has never visited. As he delves deeper into the mystery he begins to question his very reality, and wonders which memories are real(n)

programme.title: The Rookie
programme.desc: Dennis Quaid's performance as former Major League pitcher Jim Morris sparks this winning fact-based sports bio. Morris, a teacher and coach, challenges his squad to win their division. They, in turn, inspire him to take another shot at playing pro ball. Rachel Griffiths, Brian Cox, Angus T. Jones(n)

programme.title: Sweet Home Alabama
programme.desc: Romantic comedy in which a New York fashion designer must confront her white trash past - specifically the redneck childhood sweetheart to whom she is still married - in order to gain the divorce that will enable her to wed her new beau(n)

programme.title: That Thing You Do!
programme.desc: A '60s pop group finds fame thanks to hit single and a savvy record exec who polishes their image in this comedic drama packed with catchy, original music. Following a grueling tour schedule and a moviemaking stint, the band starts to disintegrate(n)

programme.desc: A synchronised skating competition with a $500 prize brings X and his friends face-to-face with rival rollers Sweetness and his gang. But who's got the smooth moves to win? Disco dancing family drama set in the 70s(n)

programme.title: There's Something About Mary
programme.desc: Lovelorn Ben Stiller hires sleazy investigator Matt Dillon to track down childhood sweetheart Cameron Diaz. Gross-out gag fest of hair gel, horny hounds and humiliation(n)

programme.title: The White Queen
programme.desc: War at First Hand. Lancaster is restored to the throne, with Warwick in control. But rumours that Edward is returning with an army unsettle the court. Anne and Margaret of Anjou sail from France, uncertain they will reach Warwick in time to win. Divided families face each other across the battlefield. Can Elizabeth's witchcraft save her husband, or will Warwick triumph? As many fall in the battle, everyone's fortunes change forever(n)

programme.title: Sweet Home Alabama
programme.desc: Romantic comedy in which a New York fashion designer must confront her white trash past - specifically the redneck childhood sweetheart to whom she is still married - in order to gain the divorce that will enable her to wed her new beau(n)

programme.title: Jerry Maguire
programme.desc: Tom Cruise stars as a successful sports agent who sticks to his principles and discovers that there's no room for honesty and integrity in the dog-eat-dog corporate world of professional sports. After losing his job with the agency, he sets out on his own with a loyal co-worker his only employee, and an up-and-coming football star (Cuba Gooding Jr.) as his sole client. Renee Zellweger, Kelly Preston, Bonnie Hunt(n)

programme.title: There's Something About Mary
programme.desc: Lovelorn Ben Stiller hires sleazy investigator Matt Dillon to track down childhood sweetheart Cameron Diaz. Gross-out gag fest of hair gel, horny hounds and humiliation(n)

programme.title: Walk Hard: The Dewey Cox Story
programme.desc: Poor Alabama musician Dewey Cox is determined to make his parents proud by becoming a star. Smart spoof of worthy music biopics from the writer of Knocked Up(n)

programme.title: The Anniversary Party
programme.desc: (2001) Alan Cumming and Jennifer Jason Leigh wrote, produced and directed The Anniversary Party , still finding the energy to star as Joe and Sally Therrian, a Hollywood couple celebrating their sixth anniversary. He's a writer trying his hand at directing, she's an actress who's feeling time catching up with her. Invited to the party are a host of friends from their demi-monde, including Kevin Kline as Cal Gold, no longer first call when a rom-com leading man is needed; and Gwyneth Paltrow as Skye Davidson, a rising young star. Also invited are the Therrians' neighbours Ryan and Monica Rose (Denis O'Hare and Mina Badie) who have nothing in common with the gathering of once bright young things. But as the night progresses and drink and drugs begin to take effect, truths are revealed, old enmities expressed and sexual scores settled in a cool, intelligent film that is about smart people whose lives are ruined by having to act dumb(n)

programme.title: Roll Bounce
programme.desc: A synchronised skating competition with a $500 prize brings X and his friends face-to-face with rival rollers Sweetness and his gang. But who's got the smooth moves to win? Disco dancing family drama set in the 70s(n)

programme.title: Ratatouille
programme.desc: In this delectable Disney-Pixar hit from the director of "The Incredibles," a rat who dreams of becoming a gourmet chef teams up with an inexperienced kitchen worker at one of Paris' finest restaurants(n)

programme.title: For Love of the Game
programme.desc: Based on the novel by Michael Shaara, For Love of the Game brought Kevin Costner back to the world of baseball after his successes with Bull Durham (1988) and Field of Dreams (1989). Billy Chapel (Kevin Costner) is a star pitcher with the Detroit Tigers, standing on the mound at Yankee Stadium and throwing what is shaping up to be a perfect game with the help of his best friend and catcher, Gus Osinski (John C. Reilly). However, Billy is having a hard time keeping his mind on the game; he's come to a crossroads in both his personal and professional lives, and he isn't sure what to do or where to go. He's learned that the Tigers are about to be sold, and the new owners intend to trade him at the end of the season, and that his girlfriend Jane (Kelly Preston) is planning to leave him. For Love of the Game represents a change of pace for director Sam Raimi, best-known for the Evil Dead trilogy and the acclaimed suspense drama A Simple Plan (1998) (although Raimi, a baseball fan born in Michigan, doubtless enjoyed making a film featuring the Detroit Tigers)(n)

programme.title: The River Wild
programme.desc: A woman tries to save her troubled marriage when she takes her family on a rafting vacation, but they hit rough waters after meeting up with two seemingly nice strangers(n)

programme.title: Gangs of New York
programme.desc: Martin Scorsese re-creates the mean streets of Manhattan in this historical epic set in the 1860s. Daniel Day-Lewis is a brutal gang leader; Leonardo DiCaprio, a victim's son(n)

programme.title: Walk Hard: The Dewey Cox Story
programme.desc: Poor Alabama musician Dewey Cox is determined to make his parents proud by becoming a star. Smart spoof of worthy music biopics from the writer of Knocked Up(n)

programme.title: Step Brothers
programme.desc: Spoiled middle-aged step brothers Brennan and Dale are forced by their parents to grow up and move out. Comedy(n)

programme.title: The Cable Guy
programme.desc: Comedy superstar Jim Carrey takes a risky leap into darker territory in The Cable Guy, a black comedy that featured the charismatic comic at his least likable. Matthew Broderick plays Steven Kovacs, who moves into a bachelor pad when his girlfriend (Leslie Mann) turns down his marriage proposal. Kovacs orders cable service and is greeted by Carrey's Chip Douglas, a manic, troubled geek with a lisp and an oddly menacing air. Chip insinuates himself into Kovacs' life, at first helping him win back his girlfriend, then becoming obsessively attached to his new friend to the point of becoming an ultimately relentless stalker. The film's uneven blend of humor, satire, and homoeroticism, as well as Carrey's departure from his usual goofy performances, received a lukewarm response from audiences(n)

programme.title: Up in Smoke
programme.desc: This film, while despised by critics and lovers of cinema, is cherished by fans of the comedy team, Cheech and Chong. In this wildly irreverent comedy, Man Stoner (Tommy Chong) is thrown out of his rich parent's Hollywood Hill's home and hooks up with Pedro De Pacas (Cheech Marin) the leader of a rock-and-roll band. In a van made entirely of pure marijuana, the two set out on a ride from Los Angeles to Mexico and back. Despite all of this, they still have time to enter and win a "battle-of-the-bands" contest. Up in Smoke, produced and directed by Lou Alder is Cheech and Chong's first and best film(n)

programme.title: The Cable Guy
programme.desc: Comedy superstar Jim Carrey takes a risky leap into darker territory in The Cable Guy, a black comedy that featured the charismatic comic at his least likable. Matthew Broderick plays Steven Kovacs, who moves into a bachelor pad when his girlfriend (Leslie Mann) turns down his marriage proposal. Kovacs orders cable service and is greeted by Carrey's Chip Douglas, a manic, troubled geek with a lisp and an oddly menacing air. Chip insinuates himself into Kovacs' life, at first helping him win back his girlfriend, then becoming obsessively attached to his new friend to the point of becoming an ultimately relentless stalker. The film's uneven blend of humor, satire, and homoeroticism, as well as Carrey's departure from his usual goofy performances, received a lukewarm response from audiences(n)

programme.title: Anacondas: The Hunt for the Blood Orchid
programme.desc: A corporate research team goes on an expedition through the Borneo jungle to find a rare and valuable flower. But their search is hampered by in-fighting, the elements... and a giant, ravenous snake(n)

programme.title: Primeval
programme.desc: PRIMEVAL is the story of an American news crew sent to Burundi, Africa, by its network chief to hunt and capture the legendary crocodile Gustave, who stalks a local river in search of human prey. The small crew consisting of embattled producer Tim Manfrey, reporter Aviva Masters, and their cameraman Steven Johnson are joined by two animal experts: one a Steve Irwin-style croc hunter, the other a local named JoJo(n)

programme.title: The Condemned 2
programme.desc: A bounty hunter must fight to stay alive as he plays a deadly game, created by a wealthy and evil mastermind, in which he must hunt down his opponents before they are able kill him(n)

programme.title: Cowboy Bebop: The Movie
programme.desc: The popular animé series Cowboy Bebop gets its own feature-length film with the aptly named Cowboy Bebop: The Movie. Set in the late 21st century, it jumps into the series' story line just prior to its conclusion, with the bounty hunting crew of the interstellar craft Bebop chasing a hacker aboard a tanker into a major city on Mars. As crew member Faye Valentine closes in on the tanker, she witnesses its catastrophic explosion, which soon appears to be a viral terrorist attack as the death toll continues to mount in the days following. Furthermore, Faye caught a glimpse of the person responsible for the blast and is thus the only surviving witness of the crime. After the government puts out a large bounty for the perpetrator's capture, the Bebop gang -- slacker Spike Spiegel, former policeman Jet Black, and hacker girl genius Edward -- begin their own hunt for the mass murderer, who is eventually revealed to be one Vincent Volaju. Vincent, it turns out, was the lone survivor of a governmental medical test and now seeks revenge by unleashing the same microscopic robotic virus used in the tanker explosion on the unsuspecting city. The Bebop crew must scramble to prevent Vincent from carrying out his plan, as well as try to locate an anti-virus to counterattack the effects of Vincent's virus. Released in both dubbed and subtitled cuts in the United States in 2003, Cowboy Bebop - The Movie premiered in Japan in 2001(n)

programme.title: Gunmen
programme.desc: An ex-con and an undercover DEA agent work together to find $400 million in drug money hidden in South America—before a ruthless crime lord gets to it first(n)

programme.title: Supernova
programme.desc: James Spader and Angela Bassett headline this special-effects-laced sci-fi thriller. In the 22nd century, a medical spaceship answers a distress call on a distant colony, and rescues a lone drifter (Peter Facinelli) who has a dangerous space artifact in his possession. Robin Tunney, Robert Forster, Lou Diamond Phillips, Wilson Cruz(n)

programme.title: Bulletproof Monk
programme.desc: Chow Yun-Fat stars as an ageless Tibetan monk whose task is to guard the mystical Scroll of the Ultimate from modern-day Nazis. He rescued the scroll from their clutches in 1943, denying them victory in the war, but the fascists still want it so the Third Reich can rise again. In modern-day New York, the monk finds an apprentice in the unlikely guise of Kar, a punk pickpocket. He teaches him both the history of the scroll and the martial arts skills he will need to defend it, as the pair have to fend off the enemy, who are beginning to close in. Paul Hunter's all-action film also stars Jaime King as Scott's love interest and Victoria Smurfit as the fanatical granddaughter of Nazi Strucker(n)

The crew consists of the inventor of the gravity drive which powered the ship, called the Event Horizon, and a team of intrepid scientists. Abby detects malware in the platform's computer systems, while Ducky finds traces on the victim's body that lead to a lawyer who works for the oil company. programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Radioactive Man. Hollywood moguls and comic book fans everywhere are abuzz over the news that Radioactive Man is to be adapted into a major motion picture, and observers are surprised by two bits of news concerning the project -- Teutonic action star Rainier Wolfcastle (voice of Harry Shearer) has been cast in the title role, and the producers have chosen to shoot the entire film on location in Springfield. Bart Simpson (voice of Nancy Cartwright), an ardent Radioactive Man fan, hears there will be an open call to find a young actor to play youthful sidekick "Fallout Boy," and considers himself a cinch to win the role. However, the part instead goes to Bart's close friend Milhouse (voice of Pamela Hayden), who isn't even certain he wants it. Milhouse's dissatisfaction with his new stardom grows, and one day he disappears; Bart sets out to find him and convince him not to pass up the chance of a lifetime. Meanwhile, Mayor Quimby (voice of Dan Castellaneta) busies himself by creating a wide variety of new taxes to levy against the film's production team. "Radioactive Man" also features a cameo by Mickey Rooney, who plays himself trying to convince Milhouse to finish the film; the episode first aired on September 24, 1995(n)

programme.desc: Adam Richman takes on the Hellfire Challenge in Salt Lake City, in which he must consume a platter of extremely spicy sushi rolls and three other fiery dishes.(n)

programme.title: Man v Food
programme.desc: During a visit to Cleveland, Ohio, Adam Richman tries to finish the Melt Bar and Grilled restaurant's 5lb grilled-cheese sandwich challenge.(n)

programme.title: Jamie's American Road Trip
programme.desc: The travelling chef heads for New York, shunning the glamour of Manhattan to discover an underground gastronomic subculture run by some of the Big Apple's most colourful culinary personalities. In Queens, he meets a pioneer of Egyptian-style home-cooked food, and discovers two home-run restaurants providing the city's diners with exotic dishes at economy prices.(n)

programme.title: Paul Hollywood: City Bakes
programme.desc: The baker and celebrity chef travels to cities around the world to visit local bakeries and the bakers who work there.(n)

programme.title: Mystery Diners
programme.desc: After purchasing Cafe Aldente in Studio City, the new owners believe their employees are still practising old policies, so the Mystery Diners see if anyone is ignoring the new ones.(n)

programme.title: Mystery Diners
programme.desc: When Joe and Fran, owners of Geppino's Sicilian Kitchen, hear customer complaints about stolen items, Joe suspects their daughter's boyfriend is to blame.(n)

programme.title: Restaurant Stakeout
programme.desc: Willie Degel helps the owner of the Pita Grill in Hoboken as his staff - who are more interested in having fun than providing good customer service, risk ruining his dream.(n)

programme.title: Restaurant Stakeout
programme.desc: Willie Degel helps the owner of the Liberty Bar and Grill in Hoboken whose business is struggling after 14 years.(n)

programme.title: Home Shopping
programme.desc: A chance to purchase goods from the comfort of home.(n)

programme.title: The Green Green Grass
programme.desc: Boycie struggles to come to terms with the news that his prize bull is gay, and Marlene finds she is missing the noise of the city after suffering sleepless nights. Tyler is delighted to learn he has failed all but two of his GCSEs, thinking he will no longer be accepted at a private school - but his parents have other ideas. John Challis and Sue Holderness star.(n)

programme.title: Butterflies
programme.desc: Ria struggles to ignore Leonard, and a piece of artwork turns out to be significant for the whole family.(n)

programme.title: Sorry
programme.desc: Timothy throws a party while his parents are attending the Chartered Accountants' Ball. Ronnie Corbett stars.(n)

programme.title: As Time Goes By
programme.desc: A Hollywood producer arrives in town, full of big ideas about filming one of Lionel's books - but his plan to use authentic locations is met with disapproval. Comedy, starring Judi Dench and Geoffrey Palmer.(n)

programme.title: Whatever Happened to the Likely Lads
programme.desc: Terry decides he would like to track down some of his former girlfriends - little suspecting the shocks that await him. James Bolam stars.(n)

programme.title: Auf Wiedersehen, Pet
programme.desc: The lads move into a grim little hut on the Chocanaw reservation and set about rebuilding the bridge, but Barry begins to go off the rails as he remembers the good times with Tatiana. Work goes well thanks to help from Joe's son Chip - but Granger is livid to discover he has been made a fool of, and vows to have his revenge. Tim Healy and Jimmy Nail star.(n)

programme.title: Last of the Summer Wine
programme.sub-title: Errol Flynn Used to Have a Pair Like That.
programme.desc: Compo overhears Nora Batty discussing the effect Errol Flynn's riding outfit used to have on her, so he sets out to become the man of her dreams. Bill Owen stars.(n)

programme.title: Last of the Summer Wine
programme.desc: The trio prepare to attend a friend's funeral, and Foggy decides they should all smarten up for the occasion. However, Compo's Maurice Chevalier outfit is not what he had in mind.(n)

programme.title: Last of the Summer Wine
programme.desc: Wesley adapts a ride-on lawnmower for the purpose of cleaning windows. Nora Batty pays a visit to someone unknown, so an uneasy Compo enlists the aid of Wesley's invention to declare his love for her. Bill Owen and Kathy Staff star.(n)

programme.title: Porridge
programme.desc: Fletcher and the rest of Slade's inmates take advantage of the relaxed atmosphere - and of Barrowclough - with Mackay away on holiday. Ronnie Barker and Richard Beckinsale star.(n)

programme.title: As Time Goes By
programme.desc: A Hollywood producer arrives in town, full of big ideas about filming one of Lionel's books - but his plan to use authentic locations is met with disapproval. Comedy, starring Judi Dench and Geoffrey Palmer.(n)

programme.title: Whatever Happened to the Likely Lads
programme.desc: Terry decides he would like to track down some of his former girlfriends - little suspecting the shocks that await him. James Bolam stars.(n)

programme.title: Last of the Summer Wine
programme.desc: Suspicious about the validity of Foggy's war stories, Compo and Clegg use an old school challenge to establish the truth. Brian Wilde, Peter Sallis and Bill Owen star.(n)

programme.title: Last of the Summer Wine
programme.desc: Marina wants to deliver a giant cuddly panda as her birthday present to lover Howard, so ropes in the reluctant trio to help. Comedy, featuring a guest appearance by comedian Jim Bowen and starring Peter Sallis, Brian Wilde and Bill Owen.(n)

programme.title: Last of the Summer Wine
programme.desc: Desperate to earn some cash, Compo reveals a musical talent after being endorsed by several artists in the area and sets out as a one-man band. Comedy, starring Bill Owen, Brian Wilde and Peter Sallis.(n)

programme.title: Porridge
programme.desc: Fletcher and the rest of Slade's inmates take advantage of the relaxed atmosphere - and of Barrowclough - with Mackay away on holiday. Ronnie Barker and Richard Beckinsale star.(n)

programme.title: The Green Green Grass
programme.desc: Boycie struggles to come to terms with the news that his prize bull is gay, and Marlene finds she is missing the noise of the city after suffering sleepless nights. Tyler is delighted to learn he has failed all but two of his GCSEs, thinking he will no longer be accepted at a private school - but his parents have other ideas. John Challis and Sue Holderness star.(n)

programme.title: Only Fools and Horses
programme.desc: After a taste of the high life, Del-Boy and Rodney are back in Nelson Mandela House and back in business as Trotters Independent Traders. When they receive an invitation to a cross-Channel Navy reunion intended for dear-departed Uncle Albert, Del spies the opportunity to make a few quid on a booze cruise. The only problem is, Rodney is now the company's managing director and would never approve. David Jason, Nicholas Lyndhurst, John Challis and Tessa Peake-Jones star in the 2002 Christmas special.(n)

programme.title: Mrs Brown's Boys
programme.desc: The Browns await the fruits of their fraud after faking Grandad's death to get a payout, but the insurance company starts to grow suspicious. Agnes struggles to keep him out of sight, as she has promised the money to Dermot and Maria, who are desperate to get a place of their own.(n)

programme.title: Bottom
programme.desc: Desperate duo Richie and Eddie try to improve their sex lives by using a spray apparently able to make them attractive to the opposite sex. Starring Rik Mayall and Adrian Edmondson.(n)

programme.title: Bottom
programme.desc: Richie and Eddie await their fate when the gas man discovers they are stealing their neighbour's fuel supply. Brian Glover guest stars.(n)

programme.title: The Mighty Boosh
programme.desc: Vince's dreams of musical stardom come true when Johnny Two Hats and the Electro Girls ask him to join their new band Kraftwork Orange, leading to a parting of the ways with all that is familiar - including Howard. Comedy, with Noel Fielding and Julian Barratt.(n)

programme.title: The Mighty Boosh
programme.desc: Bob Fossil arranges for Ivan the bear to be taken to an Animal Offenders Institute after he exposes himself to the visitors - but Howard and Vince will have their work cut out getting him there in one piece without falling foul of the Hitcher.(n)

programme.title: Inside No 9
programme.desc: Successful West End actor Tony Warner's tour-de-force performance as Macbeth is the toast of the Duke of Cambridge Theatre, but his overbearing personality makes life hell for his fellow thespians. It would be very bad luck indeed if he was suddenly indisposed in some way - although not for Jim, his ever-hopeful understudy. Comedy, starring Reece Shearsmith, Steve Pemberton, Lyndsey Marshal and Julia Davis.(n)

programme.title: Inside No 9
programme.desc: Siblings Hector and Tabitha live in a carefully refrigerated gothic mansion and seldom go out, but a special event means that a babysitter is required to look after their bedridden, elderly brother Andras. For Katy, the offer of £88 for an evening's work is too good to turn down. Starring Reece Shearsmith, Helen McCrory and Aimee-Ffion Edwards.(n)

programme.title: Nathan Barley
programme.desc: Dan accidentally creates a hairstyle when he falls asleep in paint, and Nathan turns his attention to glamorous TV presenter Dajve `Dave' Bikinus, hoping to impress her with a new look. Comedy, with Nick Burns, Julian Barratt and Celia Meiras.(n)

programme.title: The Armando Iannucci Shows
programme.desc: Armando tackles the subject of morality through satirical sketches involving a randy priest who embarks on affairs with his entire congregation, and a Kenyan village community who launch an appeal to help badly funded British theatre.(n)

programme.title: Human Remains
programme.desc: Spoof documentary about a middle-aged couple who run a successful guest house in the Black Country where they collect ornamental swans and indulge in a spot of sadomasochism. Written by and starring Rob Brydon and Julia Davis.(n)

programme.title: Big School
programme.desc: When Miss Postern sets up a careers workshop, it seems her slogan `Which Way Now?' applies as much to her as it does to the pupils, not least because the guest speaker is her old teacher-training colleague - and now best-selling children's author - Fenella Forbes (played by Morgana Robinson). Meanwhile, her relationship with Mr Church has taken a downward turn after a misunderstanding over a date. On the upside, the future is looking bright for one member of staff, as Mr Martin prepares to launch a pop career. With David Walliams, Catherine Tate, Daniel Rigby, Philip Glenister, Frances de la Tour and a guest appearance by Cheryl Fergison (formerly EastEnders favourite Heather Trott).(n)

programme.title: Ever Decreasing Circles
programme.desc: Martin looks forward to his annual Austrian holiday with Anne, Howard and Hilda. Comedy, starring Richard Briers and Penelope Wilton. First broadcast February 19, 1984.(n)

programme.title: Ever Decreasing Circles
programme.desc: Martin suspects Paul will try to sabotage his vicars and tarts party. Comedy, starring Richard Briers, Peter Egan and Penelope Wilton. First broadcast February 26, 1984.(n)

programme.title: Ever Decreasing Circles
programme.desc: Martin plans an afternoon of activities for an elderly friend and her cronies, but he reckons without Paul's interference. Richard Briers, Penelope Wilton and Peter Egan star.(n)

programme.title: The Interviews
programme.desc: Key moments in the career of Ronnie Barker and Ronnie Corbett are recounted by combining clips of chat show appearances with sketches from their comedy series. Talking to the likes of David Frost, Michael Parkinson, Terry Wogan and Russell Harty, they discuss everything from their first meeting through to the very last TV programme they made together, give an insight into the inspiration behind some of their most famous sketches and what made them tick as a duo, and reveal why The Two Ronnies came to a premature end. Dawn French narrates.(n)

programme.title: The Two Ronnies
programme.desc: New World and Tina Charles perform on the vintage comedy and variety show, which includes sketches Patient, Wedding, Spoonerism and Hampton Wick.(n)

programme.title: The Two Ronnies
programme.desc: Featuring Madeline Smith in spoof drama Hampton Wick, with Barker and Corbett paying homage to Gilbert and Sullivan in their grand musical finale.(n)

programme.title: Last of the Summer Wine
programme.desc: Suspicious about the validity of Foggy's war stories, Compo and Clegg use an old school challenge to establish the truth. Brian Wilde, Peter Sallis and Bill Owen star.(n)

programme.title: Last of the Summer Wine
programme.desc: Marina wants to deliver a giant cuddly panda as her birthday present to lover Howard, so ropes in the reluctant trio to help. Comedy, featuring a guest appearance by comedian Jim Bowen and starring Peter Sallis, Brian Wilde and Bill Owen.(n)

programme.title: Last of the Summer Wine
programme.desc: Desperate to earn some cash, Compo reveals a musical talent after being endorsed by several artists in the area and sets out as a one-man band. Comedy, starring Bill Owen, Brian Wilde and Peter Sallis.(n)

programme.title: Boomers
programme.desc: They say age is but a number, and every year Joyce, Alan and the gang like to remind themselves of that by attending a 1960s-themed weekend at a seaside resort, and partying their evenings away. However, this time, Alan's in their bad books, having messed up the booking, leaving them with only two rooms between the six of them. Meanwhile, John is determined to prove he's not old and starts by taking on the climbing wall, and Carol bumps into an old friend, which could spell trouble for her relationship with Trevor. Comedy, starring Alison Steadman, Philip Jackson, Russ Abbot and Paula Wilcox.(n)

programme.title: Only Fools and Horses
programme.desc: After a taste of the high life, Del-Boy and Rodney are back in Nelson Mandela House and back in business as Trotters Independent Traders. When they receive an invitation to a cross-Channel Navy reunion intended for dear-departed Uncle Albert, Del spies the opportunity to make a few quid on a booze cruise. The only problem is, Rodney is now the company's managing director and would never approve. David Jason, Nicholas Lyndhurst, John Challis and Tessa Peake-Jones star in the 2002 Christmas special.(n)

programme.title: Only Fools and Horses
programme.desc: Del seizes a rare opportunity to make a quick profit and bring Trotters Independent Traders into the hi-tech world of satellite communications. Meanwhile, Rodney plunges to the depths of despair as his marriage continues to deteriorate. Comedy, starring David Jason and Nicholas Lyndhurst.(n)

programme.title: Only Fools and Horses
programme.desc: An audition gives Raquel the chance of a lifetime - and perhaps more importantly, an excuse to get out of Nelson Mandela House. Del-Boy is as excited as she is about the prospect, but only because he sees himself as the man behind her rapid rise to stardom. Comedy, starring David Jason, Nicholas Lyndhurst and Tessa Peake-Jones.(n)

programme.title: Only Fools and Horses
programme.desc: Del becomes a showbiz entrepreneur after discovering a sensational Tom Jones-style singer at a local club. Teaming him up with Raquel, he wastes no time in booking the duo at a birthday party for the elderly mother of a local hoodlum - but it soon becomes clear his new signing is not everything he is cracked up to be. Comedy, starring David Jason, Nicholas Lyndhurst and Tessa Peake-Jones, with a guest appearance by Philip Pope.(n)

programme.title: Only Fools and Horses
programme.desc: Del is invited to a school reunion at the Nag's Head organised by old adversary Roy Slater (Jim Broadbent), who has recently been released from prison and claims to have turned over a new leaf. Comedy, starring David Jason, Nicholas Lyndhurst and Tessa Peake-Jones.(n)

programme.title: Only Fools and Horses
programme.sub-title: He Ain't Heavy, He's My Uncle.
programme.desc: Uncle Albert falls victim to muggers, so Del-Boy resolves to take the law into his own hands, while Rodney becomes a director in Trotters Independent Traders - and his first job is to give the car a good clean. Comedy, starring David Jason, Nicholas Lyndhurst and Buster Merryfield.(n)

programme.title: Gavin & Stacey
programme.desc: The newlyweds return from their honeymoon to a big welcome from both their families. However, Smithy seems disconcerted by his pal's return and Nessa makes a confession that spoils the happy occasion. Comedy, starring Mathew Horne, James Corden and Joanna Page.(n)

programme.title: Gavin & Stacey
programme.desc: Smithy goes missing following Nessa's shocking revelation, and the boys try to track him down to persuade him to accept his responsibilities. Meanwhile, Stacey is forced to contemplate the consequences of transforming her long-distance relationship with Gavin into a functioning marriage.(n)

programme.title: Gavin & Stacey
programme.desc: Smithy accompanies Nessa to the hospital for her first ultrasound scan, and the pair catch a glimpse of their baby. Stacey becomes unusually excited at the prospect of a weekend visit to her family home after she struggles to adjust to her role as an `Essex wife' - which proves to lack some of the glamour she had expected.(n)

programme.title: Bottom
programme.desc: Richie prepares for his birthday celebration - but suffers an accident while putting up the decorations and breaks his leg. Only Eddie's mates Spudgun and Dave Hedgehog show up at the party and it dawns on Richie that he has no real friends. Anarchic comedy, starring Rik Mayell and Adrian Edmondson.(n)

programme.title: Filthy, Rich and Catflap
programme.desc: Richie plans to profit from his father's death by selling advertising rights for the funeral. When the old man recovers however, the comic takes matters into his own hands.(n)

programme.title: You Gotta Eat Here
programme.sub-title: Melt Bar & Grilled, Mamo Burger, Ernie's Coffee Shop.
programme.desc: John Catucci tackles extreme grilled cheese at Cleveland's Melt Bar & Grilled, then heads to Windsor, Ontario for hand-crafted burgers at MamO Burger Bar.(n)

programme.title: You Gotta Eat Here
programme.sub-title: Yellowbelly Brewery, Fat Bob's Smokehouse, 850 Degrees Pizzeria.
programme.desc: John Catucci samples east coast hospitality at the Yellowbellly Burger in St. John's, and in Buffalo, barbecue is the order of the day at Fat Bob's Smokehouse.(n)

programme.title: The Great British Bake Off
programme.desc: The three remaining contestants head for Fulham Palace in London for the grand final, where they are challenged to use all their skills to recreate the 19th-century tea parties once hosted in the area. Mary Berry and Paul Hollywood are joined by former competitors to pass judgement on the items offered, before Mel Giedroyc and Sue Perkins present the victor with the Bake Off trophy.(n)

programme.title: MasterChef: The Professionals
programme.desc: The remaining chefs are asked to prove their creativity, as judges Michel Roux Jr and Monica Galetti push them to the limits of their ability. The contestants have to prepare two dishes from left-overs including meat bones, chicken carcasses, fish trimmings, vegetable peelings, stale croissants and bread, and over-ripe fruit, with the judges sending one more chef home at the end.(n)

programme.title: Destination Flavour Down Under
programme.sub-title: Australia - New South Wales North Coast.
programme.desc: Adam Liaw takes a tour of the north coast of New South Wales, and discovers spectacular surroundings and a tight-knit food community producing lemon myrtle and mulloway.(n)

programme.title: Hairy Bikers' Best of British
programme.desc: Si King and Dave Myers focus on British sheep, which have provided the nation with milk, meat and wool for thousands of years. They rustle up a hogget and barley stew, lamb chops with kidneys, and North African dish mechoui lamb, and explore the history of the hardy breed found on North Ronaldsay in the Orkney Islands.(n)

programme.title: Paul Hollywood's Bread
programme.desc: The master baker reveals how to make sourdough, harnessing natural, airborne yeasts to leaven and give amazing flavour. He starts by baking a classic recipe in a traditional banneton basket, which gives the crust its characteristic ring pattern, and from this base he makes a white chocolate and raspberry variety and a tuna salad Nicoise with tapenade and a leaf-shaped sourdough fougasse stuffed with olives.(n)

programme.title: James Martin's United Cakes of America
programme.desc: James's road trip to discover the best cakes, buns and fabulous bakes in America continues in Lancaster, Pennsylvania, where he samples shoofly pie and learns how to twist pretzels.(n)

programme.title: Rick Stein: From Venice to Istanbul
programme.desc: The chef continues his 900-mile road trip from Venice to Istanbul, sampling that array of gastronomic delights that lie on the route. In the penultimate episode Rick arrives in the Greek Peloponnese where he samples mouth-watering dishes such as rooster stew hilopites with mizithra cheese, and a home-made moussaka he claims is the best he have ever savoured. In his Symi island kitchen, Rick rolls up his sleeves to prepare galaktoboureko, a dessert of semolina custard in filo pastry, a favourite dish in Greece.(n)

programme.desc: Chef Angela Hartnett joins Michel Roux Jr in the kitchen for a discussion on food they consider a guilty pleasure. She creates a pizza bianco using rich and creamy Tallegio cheese, while resident drinks expert Kate Goodman picks three Italian reds that perfectly complement the dish. Plus, Rachel Khoo argues the case for full-fat food and Michel prepares an indulgent chocolate and salted caramel dessert.(n)

programme.title: MasterChef
programme.desc: The four heat winners enter the quarter-final, in which they face the daunting challenge of the Critic's Brief. Guest judge Jay Rayner gives them a simple instruction for a main dish - the twist being, the amateur cooks don't know who has set it until they come face to face with the food critic to hear his verdict. It's then back to the kitchen to prepare a dessert, again based on Rayner's brief - and this time, the one that doesn't make the grade fails to make it through to knockout week.(n)

programme.title: MasterChef
programme.desc: John Torode and Gregg Wallace put more keen cooks to the test in first of two heats this week. As usual they begin by serving up their Calling Card, a dish that showcases their talents. The judges' two favourites then sit it out while the others reinvent what they've just made, creating a new plate of food based on the main ingredient from the first round. After this cook-off, one of the amateurs is sent home, before the remaining four prepare dinner for a trio of former MasterChef champions, after which Friday's first two quarter-finalists will be decided.(n)

programme.title: Prisoners
programme.desc: A small-town carpenter turns vigilante in order to rescue his abducted daughter and her best friend in this thriller starring Hugh Jackman and Jake Gyllenhaal. Six-year-old Anna and her friend Joy have vanished on Thanksgiving without a trace. Devastated, Anna's father Keller (Jackman) makes note of a run-down RV that had been parked on their street at the exact time the girls went missing. When the driver, Alex Jones (Paul Dano) is swiftly arrested by Detective Loki (Gyllenhaal), it starts to look like the lead will pay off. Alex, however, is quickly released due to lack of evidence, sending Keller into a frenzy as he realizes that if Anna isn't found soon, odds are she never will be. Knowing that time is not on his side, and ignoring Detective Loki's pleas to leave the case to the pros, Keller risks sacrificing his own freedom in a bid to locate the girls before it's too late. Melissa Leo, Maria Bello, Terrence Howard, and Viola Davis co-star(n)

programme.desc: Three years later, the four best friends from 'The Sisterhood of the Traveling Pants' embark on separate paths for their first year of college and the summer beyond. Bridget (Blake Lively), who's having an existential crisis missing her mother, decides to travel to an archaeological dig. programme.title: The Sisterhood of the Traveling Pants 2
programme.desc: Three years later, the four best friends from 'The Sisterhood of the Traveling Pants' embark on separate paths for their first year of college and the summer beyond. But they remain in touch by sharing their experiences with honesty and humor. Lena (Alexis Bledel) has traveled to Providence, RI, to take a painting course. Bridget (Blake Lively), who's having an existential crisis missing her mother, decides to travel to an archaeological dig. Carmen (America Ferrera) is now working on the backstage crew for a Vermont-based theater festival and has the chance of her life and Tibby, still editing her documentary, remains in New York(n)

programme.title: The Kid Stays in the Picture
programme.desc: Based on Robert Evans' infamous expose of Hollywood, this documentary tells his story, from a bit-part actor to Hollywood mogul (credits include Love Story and The Godfather ) and marriage to Ali McGraw before an arrest for drug possession seemed to end his career. But, as Nanette Burstein and Brett Morgen's film shows, he bounced back as an indie, producing Sliver and The Saint in this fascinating insight into Tinseltown(n)

programme.desc: Girlfriends. Bret and Jemaine use the language of love to charm two ladies who work in a bakery, while Murray continues his quest to find an elusive record deal for the band(n)

Laura Linney, Will Patton, Lucinda Jenney, Alan Bates(n)

programme.desc: Director Tracy Droz Tragos examines the debate over abortion rights in her home state of Missouri by telling the personal stories of numerous womens' experiences in this documentary. programme.title: Making 'Neighbors 2: Sorority Rising'
programme.desc: A look at "Neighbors 2: Sorority Rising," a sequel to the 2014 comedy that finds a young couple plagued by yet another Greek menace: the sisters of Kappa Kappa Nu. The film stars Seth Rogen, Zac Efron and Chloë Grace Moretz, and is directed by Nicholas Stoller(n)

programme.title: The Great Raid
programme.desc: John Dahl directed this war drama based on the true story of one of the most daring military actions of World War II. In the waning days of World War II, General Douglas MacArthur chose to make good on a pledge that he made in 1942 -- that he would return to the Philippines after he and his troops were forced to retreat. However, MacArthur's determination was more than a matter of pride. Over 500 American soldiers were being held in Cabanatuan, a notoriously brutal prisoner of war camp in the Philippines operated by the Japanese army, and MacArthur wanted to see to it that they made it home. MacArthur chose Lt. Col. Henry Mucci (Benjamin Bratt) to lead the Sixth Ranger Battalion on a mission 30 miles behind enemy lines to infiltrate Cabanatuan and liberate the American prisoners. With the help of Capt. Prince (James Franco), Mucci leads his men on a life-or-death raid against forces known for their savagery. The Great Raid was based on William B. Breuer's book The Great Raid on Cabanatuan: Rescuing the Doomed Ghosts of Bataan and Corregidor, and also stars Joseph Fiennes, Connie Nielsen, and Marton Csokas(n)

programme.title: Mission to Mars
programme.desc: A rescue mission is launched to investigate a mission to mars that ended in catastrophe and mysterious disaster(n)

programme.desc: B.J. and the A.C. Kevin has unexpected visitors at home, while work brings more surprises with a holiday display snafu and a detainee from another police station. Elsewhere, Tom and Christine encounter more trouble on the road and at a hospital(n)

programme.desc: A look at "Neighbors 2: Sorority Rising," a sequel to the 2014 comedy that finds a young couple plagued by yet another Greek menace: the sisters of Kappa Kappa Nu. The film stars Seth Rogen, Zac Efron and Chloë Grace Moretz, and is directed by Nicholas Stoller(n)

programme.title: The Great Raid
programme.desc: John Dahl directed this war drama based on the true story of one of the most daring military actions of World War II. In the waning days of World War II, General Douglas MacArthur chose to make good on a pledge that he made in 1942 -- that he would return to the Philippines after he and his troops were forced to retreat. However, MacArthur's determination was more than a matter of pride. Over 500 American soldiers were being held in Cabanatuan, a notoriously brutal prisoner of war camp in the Philippines operated by the Japanese army, and MacArthur wanted to see to it that they made it home. MacArthur chose Lt. Col. Henry Mucci (Benjamin Bratt) to lead the Sixth Ranger Battalion on a mission 30 miles behind enemy lines to infiltrate Cabanatuan and liberate the American prisoners. With the help of Capt. Prince (James Franco), Mucci leads his men on a life-or-death raid against forces known for their savagery. The Great Raid was based on William B. Breuer's book The Great Raid on Cabanatuan: Rescuing the Doomed Ghosts of Bataan and Corregidor, and also stars Joseph Fiennes, Connie Nielsen, and Marton Csokas(n)

programme.title: Mission to Mars
programme.desc: A rescue mission is launched to investigate a mission to mars that ended in catastrophe and mysterious disaster(n)

programme.title: Defending Your Life
programme.desc: An advertising executive gets into a terrible auto accident and awakens to find himself in heavenly Judgment City. There he learns he must meet with a bureaucratic panel and defend his existence. If he persuades them that he lived a productive life free from unnecessary fear, then he will be admitted into Heaven. If he fails, he must go back to Earth and try again. Since the executive had been a notoriously selfish coward during his earthly existence, he definitely has his work cut out for him(n)

programme.title: Haiku Tunnel
programme.desc: Co-writer, co-director and star Josh Kornbluth crafts a winning satire of the corporate 9-to-5 grind. Kornbluth plays a neurotic San Francisco temp, a likable aspiring novelist whose world unravels when he takes a permanent position at a law firm. The "perm" must deal with corporate idiosyncrasies, a powerful boss and the challenge of mailing out 17 "very important letters."(n)

programme.title: Down Periscope

programme.title: Sisters
programme.desc: Two daffy adult sisters, one an irresponsible single mom and the other a kindhearted nurse, decide to throw one last wild party at their childhood home before it's sold by their parents. However, their bash ends up going disastrously awry(n)

programme.title: Blues Brothers 2000
programme.desc: This sequel to the 1980 comedy "The Blues Brothers" finds brother Elwood released from jail and looking to re-form the band with a burly bartender after the death of brother Jake(n)

programme.title: Hairspray
programme.desc: Adam Shankman's adaptation of the 2002 musical (itself an adaptation of John Waters' 1988 original movie) stars John Travolta, Queen Latifah and Nikki Blonsky. Teen Tracy Turnblad's regular cultural highlight is a local television music-and-dance programme called The Corny Collins Show. And, like all her friends, she dreams of having a chance to appear on it. However, this is Baltimore and it is 1962 - and Tracy's both overweight and, worse, has liberal attitudes to race relations, which don't sit comfortably with the segregationist views of the show's producer. But, could Tracy's ambitions for not only appearing on the show, but also racially integrating it, receive a fillip when she meets the son of Motormouth Maybelle, host of the monthly 'Negro Day' edition of the show? Also starring John Travolta (in drag and a fat-suit) as Tracy's mum, Christopher Walken, as her dad, and Amanda Bynes, James Marsden, Brittany Snow, Zac Efron and Elijah Kelley; plus cameos from the star of the original movie, Ricki Lake, and its director, John Waters(n)

Khan Chittenden is superb as the lad-in-love. Directed by Cherie Nowlan(n)

programme.title: Grumpy Old Men
programme.desc: This cheerful holiday comedy, a surprise box office smash, featured a generous dollop of raunchy, crude humor and was greatly elevated by the presence of masterful performers in the lead roles. Jack Lemmon is John Gustafson, an ice-fishing Minnesota native who has been feuding with his neighbor and former best friend Max Goldman (Walter Matthau) for decades. The battle of wills between John and Max is characterized by crude name calling and harmless practical jokes. Max is unaware that John is having serious problems, chiefly that his daughter Melanie (Daryl Hannah) is experiencing marital woes and that his house is about to be confiscated by an officious IRS agent (Buck Henry). When it seems that John and Max may finally put aside their childish rivalry, however, sexy new neighbor Ariel (Ann-Margret) arrives and dates both men, pitting them against each other more fiercely than ever before. Despite their mutual loathing, the death of a friend, John's problems, and a budding romance between Max's son Jacob (Kevin Pollak) and Melanie may force the two old friends to reconcile(n)

programme.desc: Dozens of delightfully dotty dogs are in the 'spot' light again, and the baddest baddie of them all returns to the big screen in this long-awaited sequel to Disney animated classic 101 Dalmatians. Yes, Cruella De Vil is back, but she's a reformed character. Or is she? Three years after her dog-napping escapades, Cruella says she's changed - she wants to be known as Ella and even buys a dog shelter. But when pooches start to disappear, even her probation officer begins to wonder. And her sinister new partner, French fashion designer Jean Pierre Le Pelt, adds to the impression that Cruella's up to her old tricks. There are dastardly deeds and fur-ocious fun afoot in this crazy canine caper that's a real doggy treat. (2000) Stars: Glenn Close, Gerard Depardieu, Ioan Gruffudd, Alice Evans, Tim McInnerney(n)

programme.title: Alvin and the Chipmunks: The Road Chip
programme.desc: When Dave (Jason Lee) introduces Alvin, Simon, and Theodore to his new girlfriend Samantha (Kimberly Williams-Paisley) and her troublemaking son Miles (Josh Green), the chipmunks begin to panic at the thought of Dave proposing to her while on a trip to Miami. Fearing that they will be sent back to the forest if the relationship becomes too serious, the three decide to head to Florida to stop the proposal. Luckily, Miles isn't thrilled with the idea of having a stepfather, so he decides to accompany them on their zany road trip. Justin Long, Matthew Gray Gubler, and Jesse McCartney provide the voices of the chipmunks. Bella Thorne and Tony Hale co-star. Directed by Walt Becker(n)

programme.desc: Ashton Kutcher and Brittany Murphy are a chalk-and-cheese couple who fall in love and marry. Now, all they need for the union to work is to survive both families who disapprove of the match, deal with the well-meaning friends who meddle too much and, on their honeymoon, suffer a selection of Europe's worst accommodation. Shawn Levy's romantic comedy, although occasionally succumbing to America's view of Europe, is held together by the two leads, particularly Murphy's unexpected gift for comedy(n)

programme.title: Cloud Atlas
programme.desc: This epic comprises six tales from various historical eras. An 18th-century notary goes on a sea voyage; a musician becomes an apprentice to a famous composer in 1930s Belgium; a journalist uncovers corruption at a nuclear power plant in '70s California; a contemporary publisher seeks refuge from gangsters at a nursing home; a clone escapes her job at a fast-food establishment in futuristic Korea; a tribesman struggles to survive in a post-apocalyptic wasteland(n)

programme.title: The Jewel of the Nile
programme.desc: The Jewel of the Nile takes up where Romancing the Stone left off, with romance novelist Joan Wilder (Kathleen Turner) traveling around the world with her boyfriend, Jack Colton (Michael Douglas). But Joan is becoming bored with Jack and all the romantic attention; as she asks, "How much romance can one woman take?" Invited by Omar (Spiros Focas), a wealthy Arabian potentate, to travel with him to his homeland, Joan readily accepts. Jack decides to pass on the trip, preferring instead to sail through the Mediterranean. It turns out that Omar wants to usurp the role of an Arab holy man known as "The Jewel of the Nile" (Avner Eisenberg), and Joan finds herself thrown in prison with the hapless spiritual leader. Jack comes to the rescue, teaming up with the slapstick bad guy from Romancing the Stone, Ralph (Danny DeVito). Together, the foursome have to cross North Africa in order to escape Omar's minions(n)

programme.title: Off-Air
programme.desc: Programming resumes at 060(n)

Samuel L. Jackson, Djimon Hounsou, John Hurt, and Jim Broadbent co-star(n)

programme.title: Wildcats
programme.desc: Blonde-haired, blue-eyed women's libber Molly McGrath (Goldie Hawn) quits her teaching job at a comfortable middle-class school to take a new position as varsity football coach at a predominantly black inner-city school. Culture and gender clashes abound; she must win over the hard-boiled youths, convince them to practice hard and show up for class, and convince them they can win football games. Her job begins to take a toll on her family, however, when her ex-husband (James Keach) attempts to take away her daughter, claiming she is neglecting her responsibilities as a mother. Wildcats marked the fourth sports film directed by Michael Ritchie(n)

programme.title: Making of 'Straight Outta Compton'
programme.desc: A look at "Straight Outta Compton," a 2015 drama that chronicles the history of the hip-hop group NWA in 1980s California. The film stars Jason Mitchell, Corey Hawkins, O'Shea Jackson Jr., Aldis Hodge and Neil Brown Jr., and is directed by F. Gary Gray(n)

programme.title: Patria O Muerte: Cuba, Fatherland or Death

During his quest, Eric is also endangered by his feelings for fellow warrior Sara (Jessica Chastain), since ice queen Freya has decreed that love is forbidden in her kingdom. Directed by Cedric Nicolas-Troyan(n)

programme.title: December Boys

programme.title: Mamma Mia!
programme.desc: Longing to discover the identity of her true father before she exchanges her wedding vows, the daughter of a once-rebellious single mother secretly invites a trio of paternal candidates to her upcoming wedding in this feature adaptation of the beloved stage musical. Independent-minded single mother Donna (Meryl Streep) has always done her best to raise her spirited daughter, Sophie (Amanda Seyfried), while simultaneously running a successful hotel on a small Greek island, but now the time has come for this hardworking mom to finally let go. In just a few days, Sophie will be married, and Donna will stand by bittersweetly as her little girl takes flight. Of course, Donna's lifelong friends Rosie (Julie Walters) and Tanya (Christine Baranski) will both be present at the wedding, but unbeknownst to the mother, Sophie has furtively invited three very special guests of her own. When Sophie walks down the aisle on that fateful day, she wants her father to hand her off. The only problem is that Donna has never revealed the true identity of Sophie's father, leaving the resourceful future bride to narrow the list down to three potential candidates. Now, as three key figures from Donna's past return to the picturesque Mediterranean shores they all walked 20 years prior, one beautiful bride will discover the secret of her past while one lonely mother finds out that it's never too late for a little romance. Phyllida Lloyd, director of both the original London sensation as well as the hit Broadway incarnation, makes her feature directorial debut with this big-screen version of the beloved musical featuring 22 classic ABBA hits. Pierce Brosnan, Colin Firth, Stellan Skarsgård, and Dominic Cooper co-star(n)

programme.title: Inception
programme.desc: Your mind is the scene of the crime. Box-office superstar Leonardo DiCaprio stars in this contemporary science fiction action film set within the architecture of the mind. Written, directed and produced by Oscar® and Golden Globe nominee Christopher Nolan (The Dark Knight, Batman Begins, The Prestige), this eagerly awaited follow-up to 2008's billion-dollar blockbuster is yet another visionary tale from a startingly original filmmaker who continually raises the bar with every film he makes. Shooting in London, Paris, Tangiers, Calgary and Los Angeles, Nolan's mind-bending film also stars Academy Award® winners Michael Caine and Marion Cotillard, in addition to Juno's Ellen Page, Batman Begins' Cillian Murphy and Oscar® nominees Ken Watanabe (The Last Samurai) and Tom Berenger (Platoon)(n)
