Fantasy adventure, starring Chris Hemsworth, Charlize Theron, Emily Blunt and Jessica Chastain.(n)

programme.title: The Mummy Returns
programme.desc: Married explorers Rick and Evelyn battle the newly resurrected mummy Imhotep and his ruthless partner, who have captured their son. The undead creature is heading for a confrontation with a legendary ancient warrior - with power over a magical army to be won. Fantasy adventure sequel, starring Brendan Fraser, Rachel Weisz, John Hannah, Arnold Vosloo, Oded Fehr and Patricia Velasquez, with a brief appearance by Dwayne Johnson.(n)

programme.title: Con Air
programme.desc: A parolee hitches a ride home on a maximum-security flight conveying some of America's deadliest criminals, and when they hijack the plane in mid-flight he is forced to intervene. Meanwhile, a US marshal has an ongoing battle on the ground to prevent the plane from being blown to pieces. Action thriller, starring Nicolas Cage, John Cusack, John Malkovich, Steve Buscemi, Ving Rhames and Colm Meaney.(n)

programme.title: The Salvation
programme.desc: A Danish settler in the Wild West is joined by his wife and son, but they are soon murdered. He avenges their deaths, but his actions attract the wrath of a ruthless gang leader. Abandoned by his friends and neighbours, the peaceful pioneer is forced to stand alone to enforce the law in his new home. Western, starring Mads Mikkelsen and Eva Green.(n)

programme.title: Masters of the Universe
programme.desc: The heroic warrior He-Man sets out to bring an end to the evil Skeletor's reign of terror, but is transported to Earth by a cosmic key, with his arch enemy's henchman in hot pursuit. Fantasy adventure, starring Dolph Lundgren, Frank Langella, Meg Foster and Billy Barty.(n)

programme.title: Deja Vu
programme.desc: A federal agent investigating the bombing of a ferryboat in New Orleans is given access by the government to a top-secret device that allows him to see into the past. He focuses on one victim in particular, a woman whom he believes holds the key to the crime, and becomes convinced that he can prevent the explosion ever happening. Sci-fi thriller, with Denzel Washington, Paula Patton, Val Kilmer and Jim Caviezel.(n)

programme.title: Ant-Man
programme.desc: A thief attempting to go straight is recruited by a scientist, who provides him with a suit that gives him the power to shrink. He must use his new skills to carry out a special mission - helping the inventor to steal back his miniaturisation technology from a ruthless businessman who intends to turn it into a deadly weapon. Superhero adventure, starring Paul Rudd, Michael Douglas and Evangeline Lilly.(n)

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Out Of The Shadows
programme.desc: The sewer-dwelling heroes battle more bad guys when Shredder breaks out of custody and teams up with the villainous Krang. Action comedy sequel, starring Megan Fox, Will Arnett and Laura Linney.(n)

programme.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers
programme.desc: Frodo and Sam continue their quest to destroy the all-powerful ring, bringing them face to face with the magical artefact's twisted former owner Gollum. Meanwhile, their allies prepare to make a desperate last stand against the vast armies of the corrupted wizard Saruman, who has declared war on a neighbouring kingdom. Part two of Peter Jackson's fantasy adventure trilogy, starring Elijah Wood, Sean Astin, Viggo Mortensen, Ian McKellen, Billy Boyd, Dominic Monaghan, Andy Serkis and Christopher Lee.(n)

programme.title: Armageddon
programme.desc: Nasa discovers an asteroid the size of Texas is on a collision course with Earth, so a drilling expert is recruited to train a team of misfits to transport a nuclear device into outer space to destroy it - but having had no experience of space travel, the reluctant astronauts find themselves seriously out of their depth. Sci-fi thriller, with Bruce Willis, Ben Affleck, Liv Tyler, Michael Clarke Duncan, Billy Bob Thornton and Steve Buscemi.(n)

programme.title: Ant-Man
programme.desc: A thief attempting to go straight is recruited by a scientist, who provides him with a suit that gives him the power to shrink. He must use his new skills to carry out a special mission - helping the inventor to steal back his miniaturisation technology from a ruthless businessman who intends to turn it into a deadly weapon. Superhero adventure, starring Paul Rudd, Michael Douglas and Evangeline Lilly.(n)

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Out Of The Shadows
programme.desc: The sewer-dwelling heroes battle more bad guys when Shredder breaks out of custody and teams up with the villainous Krang. Action comedy sequel, starring Megan Fox, Will Arnett and Laura Linney.(n)

programme.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers
programme.desc: Frodo and Sam continue their quest to destroy the all-powerful ring, bringing them face to face with the magical artefact's twisted former owner Gollum. Meanwhile, their allies prepare to make a desperate last stand against the vast armies of the corrupted wizard Saruman, who has declared war on a neighbouring kingdom. Part two of Peter Jackson's fantasy adventure trilogy, starring Elijah Wood, Sean Astin, Viggo Mortensen, Ian McKellen, Billy Boyd, Dominic Monaghan, Andy Serkis and Christopher Lee.(n)

programme.title: Sam Churchill: Search for a Homeless Man
programme.desc: A seemingly straightforward missing persons case draws a private investigator into a battle against the members of a child pornography ring, who are holding a teenager he has been hired to find. Thriller, starring John Schneider, Robyn Lively, Alex Rocco and Rudy Ramos.(n)

programme.title: Kite
programme.desc: A teenager living in a corrupt society dominated by violent street gangs swears revenge when her parents are murdered. Joining forces with her father's former partner on the police force, she journeys into the depths of the criminal underworld to learn the killers' identities. Crime thriller, starring India Eisley and Samuel L Jackson.(n)

programme.title: Solace
programme.desc: A psychic is recruited by the FBI to help them track down an elusive serial killer before he can strike again. The case takes a psychologically dangerous turn when he realises that the murderer he is searching for has mental powers of his own. Crime thriller, starring Anthony Hopkins, Colin Farrell and Jeffrey Dean Morgan.(n)

programme.title: Every Secret Thing
programme.desc: When a young child goes missing, suspicion falls on two teenagers previously convicted for killing a baby. Thriller, starring Elizabeth Banks, Diane Lane and Dakota Fanning.(n)

programme.title: The Trust
programme.desc: Two bumbling police officers working in the evidence room of a Las Vegas station are surprised to discover a bail receipt for an unusually high sum of money. They hatch a plan to find out where this money came from, and steal it for themselves. Comedy thriller, starring Nicolas Cage, Elijah Wood and Jerry Lewis.(n)

programme.title: The Joker
programme.desc: A young cop is kidnapped by a masked serial killer. To keep himself alive, the captive detective must rely on the wisdom imparted to him by his older colleagues during their regular poker night, hoping that one of their tall tales might provide the inspiration he needs to outwit the murderer. Thriller, starring Beau Mirchoff and Ron Perlman.(n)

programme.title: Mercury Rising
programme.desc: A top-secret government agency has developed a seemingly unbreakable code - only for an autistic boy to crack it in an instant. Assassins succeed in gunning down his parents, but a maverick FBI agent investigating their deaths finds the child hiding in a closet, and resolves to shield him from the hitmen on his trail. Thriller, starring Bruce Willis, Alec Baldwin and Miko Hughes.(n)

programme.title: Solace
programme.desc: A psychic is recruited by the FBI to help them track down an elusive serial killer before he can strike again. The case takes a psychologically dangerous turn when he realises that the murderer he is searching for has mental powers of his own. Crime thriller, starring Anthony Hopkins, Colin Farrell and Jeffrey Dean Morgan.(n)

programme.title: The Trust
programme.desc: Two bumbling police officers working in the evidence room of a Las Vegas station are surprised to discover a bail receipt for an unusually high sum of money. They hatch a plan to find out where this money came from, and steal it for themselves. Comedy thriller, starring Nicolas Cage, Elijah Wood and Jerry Lewis.(n)

programme.title: Cape Fear
programme.desc: A psychopathic rapist is released from prison after 14 years and plots revenge on the defence attorney he blames for his imprisonment. Subjecting the lawyer and his family to a terrifying campaign of intimidation, he uses his knowledge of the law to stay untouchable. Martin Scorsese's thriller remake, starring Robert De Niro, Nick Nolte, Jessica Lange and Juliette Lewis, with cameo appearances by Gregory Peck, Robert Mitchum and Martin Balsam, who all appeared in the 1962 original.(n)

programme.title: Four Brothers
programme.desc: When their adoptive mother is killed in a robbery, her four sons reunite and swear vengeance on the murderers. But the background to her apparently random death turns out to be more complex than it first appeared, as the trail leads to corrupt cops and a notorious local gang boss. Thriller, starring Mark Wahlberg, Tyrese Gibson, Andre Benjamin, Garrett Hedlund, Chiwetel Ejiofor and Terrence Howard.(n)

programme.title: Hostage
programme.desc: A washed-up former hostage negotiator returns to regular police work, but later finds himself forced to draw on his old skills in a bid to save a crooked accountant's children, who have been taken prisoner in their own home by a gang of psychotic delinquents. Thriller, starring Bruce Willis, Kevin Pollak, Ben Foster and Jonathan Tucker.(n)

programme.title: Bound to Vengeance
programme.desc: A woman who is kidnapped fights back and manages to escape from her captor. She later learns she was not his only victim, and that there was a dark secret behind her abduction. The discovery drives her to hatch a plan to punish him for the suffering he has caused. Thriller, starring Tina Ivlev.(n)

programme.title: Deep Family Secrets
programme.desc: A girl sets out on a personal quest to discover the truth about her mother's alleged abduction, and uncovers a tangled tale of adultery, incest and murder. Thriller, starring Richard Crenna, Angie Dickinson and Meg Foster.(n)

programme.title: Fun with Dick and Jane
programme.desc: A highly paid executive loses everything after his corrupt boss's false accounting ruins the firm and leaves him to take the blame. Flat-broke and with no income or savings to maintain his lavish lifestyle, he and his wife decide the only way to support themselves is to turn to crime. Remake of the 1976 comedy, with Jim Carrey, Tea Leoni, Alec Baldwin and Richard Jenkins.(n)

programme.title: McCanick
programme.desc: A narcotics cop learns a small-time crook has been released from prison and goes behind the chief of police's back to organise a disproportionate manhunt for him. As his methods grow increasingly brutal, he comes closer to learning a secret from his own past. Detective drama, starring David Morse and Cory Monteith, in his final film role.(n)

programme.title: The Bone Collector
programme.desc: A quadriplegic ex-cop is saved from the brink of suicide by a rookie female officer needing his expertise to form a psychological profile of a serial killer. The murderer is posing as a cab driver and terrorising Manhattan, and has a gruesome habit of taking trophies from his victims' bodies. Thriller, starring Denzel Washington, Angelina Jolie, Michael Rooker, Mike McGlone, Luis Guzman and Queen Latifah.(n)

programme.title: Point Break
programme.desc: An undercover FBI agent is assigned to infiltrate a gang of daredevil extreme sports athletes, and prove that they are responsible for a string of audacious bank robberies. As he pushes himself to the limit to prove his worth to the group, he forms an intense relationship with their enigmatic leader. Action thriller remake, starring Edgar Ramirez, Luke Bracey and Ray Winstone.(n)

programme.title: Four Brothers
programme.desc: When their adoptive mother is killed in a robbery, her four sons reunite and swear vengeance on the murderers. But the background to her apparently random death turns out to be more complex than it first appeared, as the trail leads to corrupt cops and a notorious local gang boss. Thriller, starring Mark Wahlberg, Tyrese Gibson, Andre Benjamin, Garrett Hedlund, Chiwetel Ejiofor and Terrence Howard.(n)

programme.title: Along Came a Spider
programme.desc: A police forensic psychologist searches for the daughter of a senator, who has been kidnapped from her expensive private school by a media-obsessed teacher, sparking a desperate race to hunt down her psychotic and devilishly intelligent captor before it is too late. Thriller prequel to Kiss the Girls, starring Morgan Freeman, Monica Potter, Michael Wincott, Dylan Baker and Penelope Ann Miller.(n)

programme.title: 12 Rounds 3: Lockdown
programme.desc: A cop returns to duty after being injured in an incident that led to the death of his partner. On his first day back, he discovers evidence of corruption among his colleagues. He soon finds himself trapped inside his own precinct and fighting for survival against crooked cops determined to keep their misdeeds a secret. Action thriller sequel, starring Jonathan Good and Roger R Cross.(n)

programme.title: Point Break
programme.desc: An undercover FBI agent is assigned to infiltrate a gang of daredevil extreme sports athletes, and prove that they are responsible for a string of audacious bank robberies. As he pushes himself to the limit to prove his worth to the group, he forms an intense relationship with their enigmatic leader. Action thriller remake, starring Edgar Ramirez, Luke Bracey and Ray Winstone.(n)

programme.title: Carlito's Way
programme.desc: A former gangster is released from jail and vows to go straight, hoping to earn enough money to escape his New York roots - but his misguided loyalty to a crooked lawyer threatens to drag him back into a life of crime. Brian De Palma's thriller, starring Al Pacino, Sean Penn, Penelope Ann Miller, John Leguizamo and Viggo Mortensen.(n)

programme.title: Along Came a Spider
programme.desc: A police forensic psychologist searches for the daughter of a senator, who has been kidnapped from her expensive private school by a media-obsessed teacher, sparking a desperate race to hunt down her psychotic and devilishly intelligent captor before it is too late. Thriller prequel to Kiss the Girls, starring Morgan Freeman, Monica Potter, Michael Wincott, Dylan Baker and Penelope Ann Miller.(n)

programme.title: Zorba the Greek
programme.desc: A timid English writer arrives in Crete to open a mine for the family business and falls under the spell of a local peasant with a charismatic and inspiring zest for life. Drama, starring Anthony Quinn, Alan Bates, Irene Papas, Lila Kedrova and Sotiris Moustakas.(n)

programme.title: The Physician
programme.desc: A medieval Englishman grows up fascinated by medicine, but comes up against his society's limited knowledge of science. He learns of a great teacher in Persia, and goes in search of him hoping to learn healing skills - but is forced to keep his Christian faith a secret for fear of his life. Historical drama based on Noah Gordon's novel, starring Tom Payne, Ben Kingsley and Stellan Skarsgard.(n)

programme.title: Amistad
programme.desc: African slaves seize control of the vessel transporting them to Spain in 1839. Two surviving Spanish crewmen steer the ship to America, where the slaves are imprisoned for killing their captors - but an abolitionist lawyer argues the case for granting them their freedom. Steven Spielberg's historical drama, starring Anthony Hopkins, Morgan Freeman, Matthew McConaughey, Djimon Hounsou, Nigel Hawthorne and Pete Postlethwaite.(n)

programme.title: All Roads Lead to Rome
programme.desc: A teacher is reunited with her ex-boyfriend while staying in an Italian village. The former lovers are forced to work together when her teenage daughter and his 80-year-old mother steal a car and run away to Rome together, the former hoping to return home to her boyfriend and the latter planning to remarry against her son's wishes. Romantic comedy, starring Sarah Jessica Parker, Raoul Bova and Claudia Cardinale.(n)

programme.title: Far from the Madding Crowd
programme.desc: A headstrong Victorian woman inherits a sheep farm in a remote area of Dorset. She struggles to maintain her independence while being courted by three very different men - a stoic farmer, a dashing, reckless soldier and a lonely older man. Period drama based on Thomas Hardy's novel, starring Carey Mulligan, Matthias Schoenaerts, Tom Sturridge and Michael Sheen.(n)

programme.title: Demolition
programme.desc: A successful investment banker is left devastated by the death of his wife. A complaint to a vending machine company sets him off on a letter-writing campaign in which he makes a series of brutally honest personal admissions, providing him with the chance to make a fresh start in his life - as soon as he has finished destroying everything that used to matter to him. Drama, starring Jake Gyllenhaal, Naomi Watts and Chris Cooper.(n)

programme.title: Awakenings
programme.desc: A research doctor in a New York psychiatric hospital provokes equal measures of professional interest and suspicion when he appears to have discovered a means of reviving patients who have been trapped in a catatonic state for over 30 years. Fact-based drama, starring Robin Williams, Robert De Niro, Julie Kavner, Penelope Ann Miller, Max von Sydow and Alice Drummond.(n)

programme.title: I Saw the Light
programme.desc: Biopic of influential country singer Hank Williams, exploring his tempestuous marriage and addiction to alcohol and painkillers. With Tom Hiddleston and Elizabeth Olsen.(n)

programme.title: Demolition
programme.desc: A successful investment banker is left devastated by the death of his wife. A complaint to a vending machine company sets him off on a letter-writing campaign in which he makes a series of brutally honest personal admissions, providing him with the chance to make a fresh start in his life - as soon as he has finished destroying everything that used to matter to him. Drama, starring Jake Gyllenhaal, Naomi Watts and Chris Cooper.(n)

programme.title: Charlie Wilson's War
programme.desc: A US congressman gets embroiled in a secret mission to provide covert military support to rebels in Soviet-occupied Afghanistan. Before long, he finds unlikely allies in the shape of a womanising CIA agent, a Texan socialite and the president of Pakistan. Fact-based political drama set during the 1980s, starring Tom Hanks, Julia Roberts and Philip Seymour Hoffman.(n)

programme.title: A Promise
programme.desc: A German university graduate becomes the private secretary of a steel magnate in 1912, and an unspoken love develops between him and his employer's younger wife. He is sent overseas on business, but pledges to return in two years - however, the outbreak of the First World War drives them further apart. Romantic period drama based on Stefan Zweig's novel Journey Into the Past, with Rebecca Hall, Richard Madden and Alan Rickman.(n)

programme.title: Paint Your Wagon
programme.desc: A gold prospector buys a wife from a Mormon and agrees to share her with his mining partner when she insists they all live together. Mindful that her presence in an all-male town might give rise to jealousy, he hijacks a stagecoach carrying six working girls and opens a brothel in town. Oscar-nominated musical Western, starring Lee Marvin, Clint Eastwood, with Jean Seberg and Harve Presnell.(n)

programme.title: Pitch Perfect 2 Special
programme.desc: Anna Kendrick, Rebel Wilson and Elizabeth Banks discuss reprising their roles for the comedy sequel.(n)

programme.title: Definitely, Maybe
programme.desc: A New York advertising executive on the eve of his divorce tells his daughter about his love life before he was married, including how he met her mother. However, he changes the names of his former lovers, leaving the girl - and viewers - to guess which one of three women he ended up marrying. Romantic comedy, starring Ryan Reynolds, Abigail Breslin, Elizabeth Banks, Rachel Weisz and Isla Fisher.(n)

programme.title: Our Brand Is Crisis
programme.desc: A political advisor's career ends in disaster when she ends up at the centre of a major scandal. She is lured out of retirement to help the embattled president of Bolivia to get re-elected, but finds the opposition is being assisted by an old rival, who uses every dirty trick in the book to wreck her campaign. Comedy drama, starring Sandra Bullock, Billy Bob Thornton and Anthony Mackie.(n)

programme.title: The Walk
programme.desc: A French acrobat hatches an audacious scheme to carry out his most spectacular performance in 1974. With the aid of his circus mentor and an international team of helpers, he plans to tightrope walk between the towers of the World Trade Centre. Fact-based drama, starring Joseph Gordon-Levitt and Ben Kingsley.(n)

programme.title: Florence Foster Jenkins
programme.desc: A tone deaf socialite has dreams of becoming a singer, but problems arise when she decides to perform at Carnegie Hall. Fact-based comedy, starring Meryl Streep.(n)

programme.title: Ghostbusters: Special
programme.desc: The making of the long-awaited horror comedy sequel, including interviews with Melissa McCarthy and the rest of the cast.(n)

programme.title: Sabrina
programme.desc: A chauffeur's daughter falls for the womanising son of her father's employer, but he ignores her. However, after a long sojourn in Paris, she returns, having matured into a beautiful and poised young woman. The handsome playboy is totally smitten - even though he is on the verge of getting married. So to save the wedding, his older brother tries to romance her himself. Remake of Billy Wilder's romantic comedy, with Harrison Ford, Julia Ormond and Greg Kinnear.(n)

programme.title: Pretty Woman
programme.desc: A ruthless millionaire hires a prostitute while on a business trip. Realising she may be useful in helping him keep up a successful appearance, he pays her to accompany him for a week as he associates with the rich and powerful - but falls in love despite their many differences. Romantic comedy, starring Richard Gere and Julia Roberts, with Ralph Bellamy and Laura San Giacomo.(n)

programme.title: Florence Foster Jenkins
programme.desc: A tone deaf socialite has dreams of becoming a singer, but problems arise when she decides to perform at Carnegie Hall. Fact-based comedy, starring Meryl Streep.(n)

programme.title: Our Brand Is Crisis
programme.desc: A political advisor's career ends in disaster when she ends up at the centre of a major scandal. She is lured out of retirement to help the embattled president of Bolivia to get re-elected, but finds the opposition is being assisted by an old rival, who uses every dirty trick in the book to wreck her campaign. Comedy drama, starring Sandra Bullock, Billy Bob Thornton and Anthony Mackie.(n)

programme.title: Monster House
programme.desc: A boy becomes obsessed with a sinister elderly neighbour living in a creepy old house. On Halloween night, he and two friends discover the chilling truth - the house is alive and eats anything that comes too close, including children. Animated comedy horror, with the voices of Mitchel Musso, Sam Lerner, Spencer Locke, Steve Buscemi, Maggie Gyllenhaal and Jason Lee.(n)

programme.title: Dumbo
programme.desc: Disney animated adventure following the fortunes of a plucky young elephant with oversized ears. Mocked by his fellow circus performers, Dumbo finally finds a friend in an enterprising mouse, who helps the poor animal overcome his inhibitions and find fame and fortune as the world's only flying elephant. With the voices of Sterling Holloway and Edward Brophy, and an Oscar-winning score by Frank Churchill and Oliver Wallace.(n)

programme.title: Bambi
programme.desc: A young deer grows up in the forest, forming close friendships with other woodland creatures. When tragedy strikes, he is suddenly forced to fend for himself but ultimately becomes brave and resourceful enough to save his friends during a forest fire. Animated drama, with the voices of Bobby Stewart, Hardie Albright and Donnie Dunagan.(n)

programme.title: Zootropolis: Special
programme.desc: The making of Disney's animated buddy-cop comedy set in a world entirely populated by animals.(n)

programme.title: The Jungle Book
programme.desc: A boy is raised by animals in the jungle, leading a carefree life with his friends, a laidback bear and a wise panther. The return of a ferocious tiger who hates humans places the youngster's life in danger, and his friends must persuade him to return to the safety of his own people. Disney animated adventure based on Rudyard Kipling's stories, with the voices of Phil Harris and George Sanders.(n)

programme.title: Finding Nemo
programme.desc: Clownfish Nemo becomes separated from his friends on the Great Barrier Reef - but the thrill of being able to swim freely and away from his overprotective father turns to horror when he is netted by a diver. His distraught dad sets out on a mission to find him, while the youngster finds himself in a dentist's tropical tank. Pixar animated adventure, with the voices of Albert Brooks, Ellen DeGeneres, Alexander Gould, Willem Dafoe, Barry Humphries and Geoffrey Rush.(n)

programme.title: Top Cat Begins
programme.desc: The cunning alley cat assembles a gang of feline friends to steal diamonds from a gangster. Animated comedy, with the voices of Jason Harris and Chris Edgerly.(n)

programme.title: Inside Out: Special
programme.desc: The making of the Pixar animation, taking viewers inside the mind of a youngster as she copes with the emotional upheaval of moving to a new town and new school.(n)

programme.title: Bambi
programme.desc: A young deer grows up in the forest, forming close friendships with other woodland creatures. When tragedy strikes, he is suddenly forced to fend for himself but ultimately becomes brave and resourceful enough to save his friends during a forest fire. Animated drama, with the voices of Bobby Stewart, Hardie Albright and Donnie Dunagan.(n)

Disney animated adventure based on Rudyard Kipling's stories, with the voices of Phil Harris and George Sanders.(n)

Pixar animated adventure, with the voices of Albert Brooks, Ellen DeGeneres, Alexander Gould, Willem Dafoe, Barry Humphries and Geoffrey Rush.(n)

programme.title: Top Cat Begins
programme.desc: The cunning alley cat assembles a gang of feline friends to steal diamonds from a gangster. Animated comedy, with the voices of Jason Harris and Chris Edgerly.(n)

programme.title: Eight Below
programme.desc: An Antarctic scientific expedition has to be aborted when a blizzard hits, forcing their guide to leave behind his team of huskies in the frozen wilderness. He is determined to return and rescue the animals, but in the meantime, the dogs have to rely on pack instinct alone to ensure their survival in the hostile climate. Disney adventure, starring Paul Walker, Bruce Greenwood and Jason Biggs.(n)

programme.title: Toys
programme.desc: A dying toy-maker leaves the company to his brother, a power-mad general, who turns the friendly family factory over to the production of weapons. It falls to the general's zany nephew and his equally childlike sister to stand up for their father's benign world-view. Comedy, starring Robin Williams, Michael Gambon, Joan Cusack and Donald O'Connor.(n)

programme.title: Twins
programme.desc: An unlikely pair of brothers, who were born as the result of a one-off genetic experiment and separated at birth, are reunited in adulthood. They set out on a cross-country search for their unknown mother - fending off vicious loan sharks and a professional assassin along the way. Comedy, starring Arnold Schwarzenegger, Danny DeVito, Kelly Preston and Chloe Webb.(n)

programme.title: Eight Below
programme.desc: An Antarctic scientific expedition has to be aborted when a blizzard hits, forcing their guide to leave behind his team of huskies in the frozen wilderness. He is determined to return and rescue the animals, but in the meantime, the dogs have to rely on pack instinct alone to ensure their survival in the hostile climate. Disney adventure, starring Paul Walker, Bruce Greenwood and Jason Biggs.(n)

With the voices of Sterling Holloway and Edward Brophy, and an Oscar-winning score by Frank Churchill and Oliver Wallace.(n)

programme.title: Treasure Buddies
programme.desc: Five golden retriever puppies embark on a danger-filled quest halfway across the world as they search for the greatest treasure known to animalkind. Arriving in Egypt, the canine explorers make some new exotic friends and search through ancient ruins as they try to stop devious sphynx cat Ubasti from claiming their prize. Family adventure sequel, with the voices of Skyler Gisondo and Elaine Hendrix.(n)

programme.title: Maya the Bee Movie
programme.desc: A curious young bee befriends a number of other insects, despite her hive's strict rules on not associating with outsiders. When some of the Queen bee's royal jelly is stolen, she is accused of the crime and needs the help of her friends to track down the real culprits. Animated adventure based on Waldemar Bonsels' children's book, with the voices of Coco Jack Gillies and Kodi Smit-McPhee.(n)

programme.title: A Bug's Life
programme.desc: Well-meaning ant Flik lands his colony in trouble when he accidentally disposes of an offering meant for a swarm of greedy grasshoppers - who promptly promise a horrible revenge. Faced with the imminent destruction of the anthill, he sets out to save the situation by enlisting the help of a few would-be heroes - an out-of-work troupe of bugs from a low-rent flea circus. Pixar animation, with the voices of Dave Foley, Kevin Spacey and Julia Louis-Dreyfus.(n)

programme.title: The Lion King
programme.desc: A lion prince blames himself for his father's death and flees into the wilderness, leaving his wicked uncle to take over. As the cub grows to adulthood, he receives a vision of the dead king, who inspires him to seek revenge and reclaim his rightful throne. Disney animated musical, featuring the voices of Matthew Broderick, Jeremy Irons, Rowan Atkinson, Whoopi Goldberg and James Earl Jones.(n)

programme.title: The Angry Birds Movie
programme.desc: Outsider Red does not fit in among his island community, but he is the only one to smell a rat when a fleet of green pigs pitch up. Animation, with the voice of Jason Sudeikis.(n)

programme.title: Maya the Bee Movie

Family adventure sequel, with the voices of Skyler Gisondo and Elaine Hendrix.(n)

programme.title: Scooby-Doo
programme.desc: The hapless hound and his chums reunite after a bitter break-up to solve a baffling mystery in the ghost-themed tourist resort of Spooky Island, whose owner is convinced he has a genuine haunting on his hands. Live-action comedy adventure based on the cartoon series, starring Sarah Michelle Gellar, Matthew Lillard, Freddie Prinze Jr, Linda Cardellini and Rowan Atkinson.(n)

programme.title: Don't Breathe
programme.desc: Premiere. A trio of thieves break into the house of a blind man who is not as helpless as he seems, and their hopes of walking away with a massive fortune do not go to plan. Horror, starring Stephen Lang, Jane Levy and Dylan Minnette.(n)

programme.title: Winter
programme.desc: A father consumed by grief must come to terms with an emotional breakdown in order to save his relationship with his two young sons. Drama, starring Tommy Flanagan, Edward Ashley and David Broughton-Davies.(n)

programme.title: Central Intelligence (Extended Version) (2016)
programme.desc: Premiere. Years after being humiliated as a student, rogue CIA agent Robbie Wheirdicht turns to old classmate Calvin Joyner for help when he's targeted by his own organisation. Extended version of the action comedy, starring Dwayne Johnson, Kevin Hart and Amy Ryan.(n)

programme.title: Batman Returns
programme.desc: The masked hero returns to face the Penguin, a grotesque crime boss dwelling in the sewers who conspires with a corrupt businessman to make himself mayor. When the tycoon tries to kill his secretary, she returns as vengeful vigilante Catwoman, who soon forms an intense relationship with the dark knight in both their costumed and real identities. Tim Burton's comic-book adventure sequel, starring Michael Keaton, Danny DeVito and Michelle Pfeiffer.(n)

programme.title: The Gallows
programme.desc: A high-school play ends in tragedy when a boy is accidentally killed during a performance. The school puts on another production of the same show 20 years later which a gang of camcorder-wielding students intend to sabotage - but nobody is prepared for the ghost of the dead boy returning to terrorise the performance. Found-footage horror, starring Reese Mishler and Pfeifer Brown.(n)

programme.title: Clash of the Titans
programme.desc: The son of the Greek god Zeus is raised by humans and grows up to reject his immortal heritage in anger at the gods' cruel treatment of humans. He sets out on a quest to find a means to kill the evil lord of the underworld in revenge for his father's death, facing all manner of strange creatures. Mythological adventure, with Sam Worthington, Liam Neeson, Ralph Fiennes and Gemma Arterton.(n)

programme.title: Avengers Assemble
programme.desc: A mystical artefact is stolen from a top-secret military base by Thor's brother Loki, who plans to use it to bring about an alien invasion. Spymaster Nick Fury brings together a team of superheroes, including Iron Man, Thor, Captain America and the Hulk, to defend Earth from the impending attack. Action adventure uniting the Marvel comic-book characters, starring Robert Downey Jr, Chris Evans, Chris Hemsworth, Mark Ruffalo, Scarlett Johansson, Tom Hiddleston, Jeremy Renner and Samuel L Jackson.(n)

programme.title: Jurassic Park
programme.desc: Scientists are given a sneak preview of a safari park inhabited by genetically engineered dinosaurs created by an eccentric tycoon. However, it all goes wrong when a greedy employee sabotages the security systems, allowing the prehistoric beasts to roam free and hunt the visitors. Steven Spielberg's action adventure, starring Sam Neill, Laura Dern, Jeff Goldblum, Richard Attenborough and Samuel L Jackson.(n)

programme.title: Paranormal Activity: The Ghost Dimension
programme.desc: A man moves into a new house along with his wife, daughter and younger brother, and finds an old camcorder and a box of videotapes. The siblings start watching the tapes, which turn out to be home movies shot by the property's previous owners, but by doing so, they unleash evil spirits into the world. Horror sequel, starring Chris J Murray and Brit Shaw.(n)

programme.title: Clash of the Titans

programme.title: The Greasy Strangler
programme.desc: A tour guide competes with his son for the love of a woman as a murderer terrorises their neighbourhood. Comedy horror, starring Michael St Michaels and Sky Elobar.(n)

programme.title: Paranormal Activity: The Ghost Dimension
programme.desc: A man moves into a new house along with his wife, daughter and younger brother, and finds an old camcorder and a box of videotapes. The siblings start watching the tapes, which turn out to be home movies shot by the property's previous owners, but by doing so, they unleash evil spirits into the world. Horror sequel, starring Chris J Murray and Brit Shaw.(n)

programme.title: The Gallows
programme.desc: A high-school play ends in tragedy when a boy is accidentally killed during a performance. The school puts on another production of the same show 20 years later which a gang of camcorder-wielding students intend to sabotage - but nobody is prepared for the ghost of the dead boy returning to terrorise the performance. Found-footage horror, starring Reese Mishler and Pfeifer Brown.(n)

programme.title: Cocoon: The Return
programme.desc: Three elderly couples return to Earth five years after leaving to retire on a distant planet, surprising their families, who assumed they were dead. Several of their alien friends have come back with them to recover members of their own race left behind in cocoons on the ocean floor, one of whom has been abducted by a government research institute. Sci-fi sequel, with Wilford Brimley, Don Ameche, Steve Guttenberg and Jessica Tandy.(n)

programme.title: Continuum
programme.desc: A physicist makes a discovery that throws fresh light on his father's unexplained disappearance. He seems to have been transported through time, and there is a chance to bring him back - but doing so has dangerous consequences, leaving the scientist and his mother with a terrible choice. Sci-fi drama, starring Gillian Anderson and Haley Joel Osment.(n)

programme.title: Bicentennial Man
programme.desc: A family purchases a robot servant to perform menial tasks but quickly realises this is no ordinary droid when he begins to develop human emotions and the capacity to think for himself, a quality encouraged by his owner's children. He asks for his freedom, and spends the next 200 years struggling to come to terms with its humanity. Chris Columbus's sci-fi drama inspired by the books of Isaac Asimov, starring Robin Williams, Sam Neill, Embeth Davidtz and Oliver Platt.(n)

programme.title: Solaris
programme.desc: A psychiatrist arrives on a space station to investigate the death of its commanding officer but subsequently starts to experience frightening visions of his late wife - which seem all too real and force him to question his sanity. Sci-fi drama, directed by Steven Soderbergh and based on Stanislaw Lem's novel, starring George Clooney, Natascha McElhone, Viola Davis, Jeremy Davies and Ulrich Tukur.(n)

programme.title: Anguish
programme.desc: A teenage girl has struggled with mental health issues all her life, experiencing anxiety attacks and hallucinations. She discovers that her condition may be the result of a spirit possessing her - a revelation that leaves her forced to choose whether to allow the entity to take her over utterly or to fight to keep it under control. Horror, starring Ryan Simpkins and Annika Marks.(n)

programme.title: Ghost in the Shell: Special
programme.desc: A look at the live-action remake of the iconic sci-fi animation, starring Scarlett Johansson, Takeshi Kitano and Michael Pitt.(n)

programme.title: Star Wars: Episode VII - The Force Awakens
programme.desc: A stormtrooper fighting for an evil regime turns against his masters. He joins forces with a desert scavenger, and together they are drawn into the search for legendary war hero Luke Skywalker, who disappeared years previously. Meanwhile, a terrible weapon is about to be unleashed, that will allow the forces of evil to dominate the galaxy once again. Sci-fi adventure sequel, starring Daisy Ridley, John Boyega, Harrison Ford and Adam Driver.(n)

programme.desc: A teenager meets a girl online, only to find she is a demonic entity intent on killing her real friends. Horror, starring Alycia Debnam-Carey and William Moseley.(n)

programme.title: Unfriended
programme.desc: A group of friends using an online chatroom find themselves being stalked by an account in the name of a friend, who died a year earlier. Thriller, starring Shelley Hennig and Heather Sossaman.(n)

programme.title: Homeland
programme.desc: R Is for Romeo. Carrie and Quinn make a discovery; Keane makes a decision; Max finds trouble at work(n)

programme.title: No Escape
programme.desc: An American businessman relocates his family to Southeast Asia, but their lives are put in grave danger when they get caught up in a violent political uprising. As they attempt to reach the US embassy, they are aided by a mysterious British tourist(n)

programme.title: The Ruins
programme.desc: Four American tourists unwisely venture off the beaten path while vacationing in Cancun. When a friendly German tourist implores the Americans to help search the jungle for his missing brother, the group becomes hopelessly trapped in a nightmare scenario that seems too strange to be true(n)

programme.title: Poltergeist II: The Other Side
programme.desc: The Freeling family is once again spooked by supernatural forces in this sequel to the 1982 blockbuster(n)

programme.title: The Muppet Movie
programme.desc: Kermit the Frog and Fozzie Bear, from of the large crew of loveably fuzzy characters created by puppetmaster Jim Henson, have embarked on a quest for stardom. They take a trip to Hollywood, riding in or on a wide variety of vehicles along the way. They begin their journey on a bicycle pedalled by Kermit, but friends accumulate along the way, and they change vehicles to accomodate them. They have the additional challenge of fending off the entreaties of the heartless Doc Hopper (Charles Durning), who wants Kermit to make some advertisements promoting fried frog legs. Kermit must also cope with his amorous feelings for Miss Piggy, and hers for him. This appealing children's adventure movie has numerous scenes which do homage to classic films, and features a huge cast of Hollywood greats, from Edgar Bergen to Orson Welles, in cameo roles. A great box-office success, this movie paved the way for a number of sequels. One of the film's many songs, The Rainbow Connection, was nominated for an Oscar(n)

programme.title: Premonition
programme.desc: Linda Hanson has a beautiful house, a loving husband and two adorable daughters. Her life is perfect, until the day she receives the devastating news that her husband Jim has died in a car accident. When she wakes up the next morning to find him alive and well, she assumes it was all a dream, but is shaken by how vivid it felt. She soon realises it wasn't a dream and her world is turned upside down. Network Television Premiere(n)

programme.title: Anesthesia
programme.desc: A professor is stabbed near his NYC apartment in this deeply humane ensemble drama. Elsewhere, his daughter-in-law battles cancer, a student of his has self-harm issues, a junkie is dragged to rehab and a suburban wife longs for the city(n)

programme.title: Deuce Bigalow: Male Gigolo
programme.desc: Yet another Saturday Night Live alumnus makes his bid for big-screen success as Rob Schneider, best remembered as the "Making copies!" guy, tackles his first leading role in this broad comedy. Deuce (Rob Schneider) earns a meager living as a professional fish tank cleaner until he's asked to housesit for a gigolo. Deuce mistakenly answers the gigolo's business phone and finds himself having sex with a woman he's never met and getting paid for it (not a bad deal, since women generally avoid Deuce like the Ebola virus). It's not long before Deuce learns that there's more to selling your body than one might expect: for example, being re-styled by your pimp or having to explain your new source of income when the owner of the house gets home. Deuce Bigalow: Male Gigolo was the first feature film produced by Adam Sandler's production company, Happy Madison; Sandler himself makes a cameo appearance, while Oded Fehr, William Forsythe, Eddie Griffin, and Marlo Thomas highlight the supporting cast(n)

programme.title: A Bronx Tale
programme.desc: Robert De Niro makes his directorial debut with this expanded adaptation of Chazz Palminteri's one-character play. De Niro's role of Lorenzo Anello, an Italian-America bus driver, is secondary to the part of his son Calogero. The top dog in Calogero's Bronx neighborhood is flashy "wiseguy" Sonny. When the boy witnesses Sonny commit a murder, he honors the code of the streets and refuses to tell the cops. Sonny befriends him and introduces the impressionable youngster to the creature comforts that mob connections can bring. But though he idolizes Sonny, the boy loves and respects his decent, honest father. It takes a major tragedy for the 17-year-old boy (now played by Lillo Brancato) to decide his true course in life(n)

programme.title: No Country for Old Men
programme.desc: (2007) Ethan and Joel Coen's Oscar-laden thriller stars Josh Brolin as Llewelyn Moss, a trailer-dwelling welder and hunter. Hunting deer in the desert, he comes across a drugs exchange which has gone bloodily wrong, and among the detritus is a case containing $2m. He decides to appropriate the money, but it's not a wise move: he soon has the deadly assassin Anton Chigurh (Javier Bardem) on his trail, as well as Sheriff Ed Tom Bell (Tommy Lee Jones), and smiling bounty hunter Carson Wells (Woody Harrelson). As Moss tries to keep hold of the cash, and preserve both his own life and that of his wife Carla (Kelly Macdonald), a deadly game of cat-and-mouse is played out across the Tex-Mex border, as pursuers and the pursued try to gain the upper hand. In English, and Spanish with English subtitles. M,W,S(n)

programme.title: Medium Raw: Night of the Wolf
programme.desc: The dangerous patients at a maximum-security mental hospital break free from their rooms during a power failure, and embark on a grisly murder rampage that's destined to be remembered as one of the worst ever committed. Fifteen years ago, an elusive serial killer known as The Wolf claimed the lives of 15 young girls. Thanks to the work of Detectives Elliott Carbon (John Rhys-Davies) and Johnny Morgan ( Andrew Cymek), The Wolf was eventually captured, locked up, and placed in the care of Dr. Parker (William B. Davis). When the facility loses power and the lights go dark, however, The Wolf and the rest of the inmates seize the opportunity to reclaim their freedom. Now trapped in these winding corridors with a rampaging gang of maniacs, madmen, and murderers, Johnny and Dr. Parker must fight to survive the night, and ensure that no one escapes before order is restored(n)

programme.title: The Funhouse Massacre
programme.desc: Six psychos escape from an insane asylum and set their sights on innocent visitors to a Halloween attraction(n)

programme.title: After
programme.desc: Two bus-crash survivors awaken in an empty town and flee from an encroaching darkness(n)

programme.title: Behold the Monkey
programme.desc: Comedy about the amateurish restoration of the 'Ecco Homo' fresco in 2012, which became a worldwide sensation and made a well-meaning Spanish pensioner an overnight celebrity(n)

programme.title: The Illusionist
programme.desc: A supernaturally talented magician attempts to undermine the rigid social structure of turn-of-the-century Vienna by using his powers to win the love of his upper-class, childhood sweetheart in director Neil Burger's cinematic adaptation of Pulitzer Prize-winning author Steven Millhauser's short story. Though the ill-fated childhood romance between cabinetmaker's son Eisenheim (Edward Norton) and upper-class Sophie von Teschen (Jessica Biel) eventually resulted in the heartbroken young man leaving Austria to explore the world, his dreams of one day reuniting with the beautiful duchess never faded. Upon returning to Vienna 15 years later as a talented and renowned illusionist, Eisenheim's hopes of a reunion seem dashed when he learns that Sophie is currently engaged to the Crown Prince Leopold (Rufus Sewell). As the tensions between the Eisenheim and Leopold elevate, urbane Chief Inspector Uhl (Paul Giamatti) finds his sympathy toward Eisenheim growing, despite his formal obligations to the powerful prince(n)

programme.title: I Am Number Four
programme.desc: An alien disguised as a teenager discovers his powers after falling in love with a human woman; before long, he is forced to put his skills to the test in order to survive the intergalactic forces bent on finding and destroying him(n)

programme.title: Poltergeist II: The Other Side
programme.desc: The Freeling family is once again spooked by supernatural forces in this sequel to the 1982 blockbuster(n)

programme.title: The Atticus Institute
programme.desc: Scientists perform paranormal experiments on a woman, and strive to weaponize the evil within her. But the otherworldly power proves stronger than anyone anticipated, prompting a shocking series of events that the government tried to cover up(n)

programme.title: Reeker
programme.desc: Terrifying shocker about a foul-smelling creature that raises a horrific stink in an abandoned desert town. The monster targets a quintet of young travelers who get lost. Devon Gummersall stars as the brilliant but blind leader of the pack. Written and directed by Dave Payne(n)

programme.desc: A cop returns mysteriously from the dead as a masked avenger in this stylized thriller directed by Frank Miller ("Sin City") and based on Will Eisner's cult comic books. Gabriel Macht, Samuel L. Jackson and Scarlett Johansson head an all-star cast. Eva Mendes, Sarah Paulson, Jaime King, Eric Balfour(n)

programme.title: Capsule
programme.desc: A British fighter pilot trains to be an astronaut during the Cold War, but his space vessel malfunctions and he fights hypoxia as he gets mixed signals from the UK, the U.S. and Soviet Russia on the ground(n)

programme.title: Whiskers
programme.desc: Enchanting tale of a young boy who fears that his parents will leave his best friend - his cat Whiskers - behind when they move house. Enchanting tale of a young boy who fears that his parents will leave his best friend - his cat Whiskers - behind when they move house. During a visit to a museum, the boy makes a wish to the charitable Egyptian cat-goddess Bastet that Whiskers be transformed into a human so that his parents will have no choice but to take him with them. But when the wish is granted, all sorts of problems and fun ensue as Whiskers struggles to come to terms with life as a 30-year-old man!(n)

programme.title: The Culling
programme.desc: In this /supernatural thriller directed by Rustam Branaman, a group of college kids bound for a weekend vacation come across an abandoned young girl in a parking lot. Agreeing to drive her back to her remote country house, their weekend getaway turns into a bone-chilling nightmare(n)

programme.title: The Final Cut
programme.desc: Set in a world where implanted microchips can record all moments of an individual's life. The chips are removed upon death so the images can be edited into something of a highlight reel for loved ones who want to remember the deceased(n)

programme.title: Unnatural
programme.desc: Genetically created polar bears run amok and terrorise everyone in sight after they are created by a company seeking to take advantage of global warming(n)

programme.title: Shriek If You Know What I Did Last Friday the 13th
programme.desc: In this clever spoof of horror flicks, a reporter investigates a string of murders at a high school. Meanwhile, the school's principal tries to protect his students by hiring a mall rent-a-cop to act as a security guard(n)

programme.desc: A horror-movie fan interviews lovers of the genre to understand why people like to be scared(n)

When a friendly German tourist implores the Americans to help search the jungle for his missing brother, the group becomes hopelessly trapped in a nightmare scenario that seems too strange to be true(n)

programme.title: The Bleeding
programme.desc: In this action-packed horror shocker, former Army ranger Shawn Black (Michael Matthias) hunts the vampires that killed his family and embraces his true potential as a slayer with the help of a mysterious priest named Reverend Ray(n)

programme.title: Why Horror?
programme.desc: A horror-movie fan interviews lovers of the genre to understand why people like to be scared(n)

programme.title: In My Father's House
programme.desc: In this documentary, rapper Che "Rhymefest" Smith returns to his old neighborhood in the South Side of Chicago, and reconnects with his father for the first time in 25 years. The film chronicles Smith's yearlong journey as he purchases his dad's childhood home and deals with the revelation that his father is now a homeless alcoholic. Directed by Emmy-nominated filmmakers Ricki Stern and Annie Sundberg (The Devil Came on Horseback, Knuckleball!)(n)

programme.title: Godfrey: Regular Black
programme.desc: Comedian Godfrey delivers a stand-up routine in his hometown of Chicago(n)

programme.title: Blue Crush 2
programme.desc: California teen Dana is a champion surfer who never met a wave she couldn't conquer. When her father pressures her to buckle down and go to college, she flees her Beverly Hills home for the adventure of a lifetime. Dana's late mother grew up in South Africa, and kept a detailed diary about her childhood experiences. With the journal in hand and a mismatched gang of surf fanatics watching her back, Dana embarks on an odyssey along the breathtaking southern coast of Africa to fulfill her mother's dream-one long, flawless journey down the barrel of the killer waves of Jeffreys Bay(n)

programme.title: Sebastian Maniscalco: Why Would You Do That?
programme.desc: Comedian Sebastian Maniscalco performs a stand-up routine at New York City's Beacon Theatre(n)

programme.title: The Forger
programme.desc: A paroled thief (John Travolta) gets sucked into an audacious heist scheme to steal a Monet painting by replacing it with a perfect duplicate(n)

programme.title: The Cookout
programme.desc: A fine cast cooks up funny performances in this hilarious urban comedy. When a basketball player (Storm P) signs a $30 million contract, he invites friends and family from the 'hood to a cookout at his estate. But the barbecue doesn't go as planned, as the rich sports star deals with gold diggers, agents, stuffy neighbors and a wacky security guard (writer-producer Queen Latifah). Tim Meadows, Danny Glover, Farrah Fawcett, Ja Rule(n)

programme.title: The Preppie Connection
programme.desc: Desperate to gain the acceptance of his wealthier peers at a prestigious prep school, a working-class teen establishes a cocaine pipeline and becomes a big-time drug dealer. Based on true events that caused a national scandal in the mid-'80s(n)

programme.title: Nightlight
programme.desc: In this innovative thriller, teens playing a spooky flashlight game in the woods at night get more than they bargained for when a demon is awakened by their shenanigans(n)

programme.title: The D Train
programme.desc: A man becomes obsessed with trying to convince the most-popular guy from his high school to attend their 20-year reunion(n)

programme.title: The Culling
programme.desc: In this /supernatural thriller directed by Rustam Branaman, a group of college kids bound for a weekend vacation come across an abandoned young girl in a parking lot. Agreeing to drive her back to her remote country house, their weekend getaway turns into a bone-chilling nightmare(n)

programme.title: Bloodsucking Bastards
programme.desc: A hapless cubicle drone must defend himself against a new boss who's really a malevolent vampire, intent on populating the office with more of his kind(n)

programme.title: The Forger
programme.desc: A paroled thief (John Travolta) gets sucked into an audacious heist scheme to steal a Monet painting by replacing it with a perfect duplicate(n)

programme.title: The Preppie Connection
programme.desc: Desperate to gain the acceptance of his wealthier peers at a prestigious prep school, a working-class teen establishes a cocaine pipeline and becomes a big-time drug dealer. Based on true events that caused a national scandal in the mid-'80s(n)

programme.title: Californication
programme.desc: Mad Dogs & Englishmen. At Atticus' party, girls and mood-altering substances are provided, while Hank's friends take care of the entertainment. Later, Karen turns the tables on Hank; Atticus attempts to replicate a legendary rock-and-roll moment with help from a special fan; and Charlie has another encounter with the Widow(n)

programme.title: Californication
programme.desc: Blind Faith. Hank turns to Faith for comfort, but finds her involved with another, while Becca has some revealing news on the home front(n)

programme.title: Californication
programme.desc: The Abby. Atticus goes missing and Hank and Faith team up to track him down, but only Becca is privy to his whereabouts. Meanwhile, a session with Ophelia leaves Marcy in a knotty situation; Charlie receives an odd message from his ex; and Karen has an epiphany about her daughter(n)

programme.title: Californication
programme.desc: I'll Lay My Monsters Down. In the Season 6 finale, Hank contemplates his future and where Faith fits in; and Charlie and Marcy also ponder how things are shaping up for their relationship. Meanwhile, there's a concerted effort to see that Atticus gets to the Greek Theatre and his gig with Marilyn Manson(n)

programme.title: Lumberjack Man
programme.desc: In this horror film a demon lumberjack terrorizes the staff of Good Friends church camp as they prepare for spring break. Directed by Josh Bear. Cast includes Michael Madsen, Adam Sessler, Brina Palencia and Christopher Sabat(n)

programme.title: The D Train
programme.desc: A man becomes obsessed with trying to convince the most-popular guy from his high school to attend their 20-year reunion(n)

programme.title: Animals
programme.desc: A heartwrenching tale of addiction details a young homeless couple (David Dastmalchian and Kim Shaw) who fund their drug binges through theft. Their lifestyle comes crashing down when one of them is hospitalized(n)

programme.title: Scenarios USA Shorts: Aleah
programme.desc: A pregnant 17-year-old girl turns to the violent streets of New York after her abusive mother and boyfriend abandon her(n)

programme.title: Hit Me
programme.desc: A suicidal man (Christian Svensson) whose wife left him and took their child wants to cancel the hit he purchased on himself. Morocco Omari. Directed by Steven Minor(n)

programme.title: Paranoia
programme.desc: A tech hotshot is hired to infiltrate and steal secrets from a massive corporation, but his actions don't go unseen. Thriller(n)

programme.title: The Howling Reborn
programme.desc: A high school senior learns he descends from a long line of werewolves, and attempts to choose between embracing his inner-beast and holding on to his humanity as the long-running horror franchise returns. Will Kidman (Landon Liboiron) is your typical teenager; he's got an eye for girls, and lately his gaze has been lingering on a gorgeous classmate (Lindsey Shaw). Meanwhile, an enigmatic woman (Ivana Milicevic) from Will's distant past resurfaces with a shocking revelation: Will's ancestors were lycanthropes, and now he will inherit the secrets of their incredible power. But when Will realizes that embracing his destiny will spell certain death for the girl he loves, he prepares to make a choice that could spell the end of his monstrous bloodline, and incur the wrath of the very creatures that have claimed him as one of their own(n)

programme.title: Meet the Hitlers
programme.desc: The lives of people linked by the name Hitler are examined. Their reactions span the spectrum of human experience, from tragedy to comedy, and heartbreak to hope(n)

programme.title: Burning Bodhi
programme.desc: A circle of high-school friends reunite a few years after graduation for the funeral of Bodhi, the most-popular member of their group. However, Dylan is reluctant to attend because it will mean seeing Katy, an ex who once cheated on him with Bodhi and who is now a drug addict(n)

programme.title: Paranoia
programme.desc: A tech hotshot is hired to infiltrate and steal secrets from a massive corporation, but his actions don't go unseen. Thriller(n)

programme.title: Meskada
programme.desc: Class and economics muddy the investigation of a homicide in this thriller from director Josh Sternfeld. When a child is found murdered in the small town of Hilliard, police detective Noah Cordin (Nick Stahl) is assigned to investigate the case. The victim's mother, Allison Connor (Laura Benanti), is a wealthy and well-connected member of the County Board of Commissioners, so Cordin is under pressure to find the killer as soon as possible, but working with rookie officer Leslie Spencer (Rachel Nichols), he isn't finding many substantial clues. One of the few pieces of evidence suggests the culprit may have been from the nearby town of Caswell. Cordin was born and raised in Caswell and knows its history well -- while Hilliard is a prosperous suburban community, Caswell is a working-class town fallen on hard times, and its survival is dependent on a proposed factory coming into town. As Cordin spends more and more time in Caswell, he becomes a target for the resentment the locals feel toward their wealthier neighbors, and a tense situation becomes potentially explosive when word begins to circulate that Connor may use her influence to keep the new employer out of Caswell unless someone comes forward to identity who killed her son. Meskada (named for the county that contains both Hilliard and Caswell) also stars Norman Reedus, Kellan Lutz, Jonathan Tucker, and Grace Gummer(n)

programme.title: Streetdance Family
programme.desc: The Entity Allstars, an under-16 hip hop dance group, compete to become the top team at the IDO World Championships(n)

programme.title: House of Lies
programme.sub-title: At the End of the Day, Reality Wins
programme.desc: At the End of the Day, Reality Wins. Season 4 begins with Marty eager to grow Kaan and Associates, and telling a pregnant Jeannie exactly what her future is with the company. Meanwhile, the Pod leaves one client in pursuit of a much bigger payday(n)

programme.title: House of Lies
programme.sub-title: I'm a Motherf**king Scorpion, That's Why
programme.desc: I'm a Motherf**king Scorpion, That's Why. Marty proves his business savvy when he meets an electric car mogul; Jeannie orchestrates a chance encounter with a new client that goes terribly awry; Marty accuses Jeannie of being a dishonest person, which prompts her to reveal a difficult truth(n)

programme.title: House of Lies
programme.desc: Entropy Is Contagious. Marty and Jeannie pitch opposing strategies to a Seattle-based skincare company. Meanwhile, Doug gets fed up with Sarah's antics and puts his foot down; and Clyde discusses a business idea with an unlikely partner(n)

programme.title: House of Lies
programme.sub-title: We Can Always Just Overwhelm the Vagus Nerve With Another Sensation
programme.desc: We Can Always Just Overwhelm the Vagus Nerve With Another Sensation. Marty devises a last-ditch plan when the Gage presentation falls apart and it includes orchestrating a move that a volatile Ellis doesn't want. Meanwhile, Jeannie meets with a headhunter in her job search; and Doug petitions to join Clyde and Kelsey's new business venture(n)

programme.title: House of Lies
programme.sub-title: The Urge to Save Humanity Is Almost Always a False Front for the Urge to Rule
programme.desc: The Urge to Save Humanity Is Almost Always a False Front for the Urge to Rule. Marty devises a plan when the partnership between Ellis and Maya reaches a boiling point, but Jeannie opposes it. Meanwhile, Clyde develops feelings for Kelsey when they seek investors for their start-up(n)

programme.title: House of Lies
programme.sub-title: Trust Me, I'm Getting Plenty of Erections
programme.desc: Trust Me, I'm Getting Plenty of Erections. Marty hatches a lucrative plan with Gage Motors when the new partnership with Ellis reaches a boiling point; Jeannie seriously considers an attractive job offer; Roscoe skips school to party with some new friends(n)

programme.title: House of Lies
programme.sub-title: The Next Olive Branch Goes Straight Up Your Ass
programme.desc: The Next Olive Branch Goes Straight Up Your Ass. Trouble arises at Kaan and Associates when payment is not received from a consult. Meanwhile, Clyde gets a visit from his estranged father; Marty learns of Roscoe's entrepreneurial endeavors; and Jeannie pushes back to stay(n)

programme.title: House of Lies
programme.sub-title: He Didn't Mean That, Natalie Portman
programme.desc: He Didn't Mean That, Natalie Portman. Marty and Jeannie entice Denna with a retaliatory business move against Ellis. Meanwhile, things get complicated between Doug and Kelsey; and Clyde spends time with his father and is disturbed to see how similar they may be(n)

programme.title: House of Lies
programme.sub-title: We're Going to Build a Mothership and Rule the Universe
programme.desc: We're Going to Build a Mothership and Rule the Universe. Marty butts heads with a turnaround artist sent by Denna to grow K&A's business; Jeannie receives a dinner invitation to the Kaan home; Clyde reaches a breaking point with his father(n)

programme.title: House of Lies
programme.sub-title: Praise Money! Hallowed Be Thy Name
programme.desc: Praise Money! Hallowed Be Thy Name. Marty gets into a conflict with Denna when he pitches the CEO of a fast-food chain; Roscoe's business is exposed, which hurts his status and future at school; Doug and Clyde have different reactions to dating the same woman(n)

programme.title: House of Lies
programme.sub-title: Everything's So F**king Obvious, I'm Starting to Wonder Why We're Even Having This Co
programme.desc: Everything's So F**king Obvious, I'm Starting to Wonder Why We're Even Having This Co. Marty grows concerned about repercussions from Denna and looks to secure his place at K&A; Jeannie receives an exciting proposition; Clyde reaches out to his father; Roscoe becomes the center of an ugly incident at school(n)

programme.title: House of Lies
programme.sub-title: It's a Box Inside a Box Inside a Box, Dipsh*t
programme.desc: It's a Box Inside a Box Inside a Box, Dipsh*t. Series 4 ends with Marty on the verge of making K&A one of the biggest players in the business, if he can persuade his employees to stay. Meanwhile, Jeannie gives birth; Clyde, Doug and Kelsey await an offer; and Roscoe faces the consequences(n)

Meskada (named for the county that contains both Hilliard and Caswell) also stars Norman Reedus, Kellan Lutz, Jonathan Tucker, and Grace Gummer(n)

programme.title: My Best Friend's Girl
programme.desc: Tank faces the ultimate test of friendship when his best friend hires him to take his ex-girlfriend out on a lousy date in order to make her realise how great her former boyfriend is(n)

programme.title: Dressed to Kill
programme.desc: Violent Hitchcock-style thriller in which a prostitute suspected of murder takes on the psychopath responsible for the killing in a bid to clear her own name. Discovered shortly after she has stumbled upon the crime scene, the hooker can provide no alibi for the police. Her only recourse is to expose the real killer - assuming she can avoid becoming the next victim(n)

programme.title: America's Sweethearts
programme.desc: Comedy about two movie stars who, despite breaking up messily and publicly, need to get together to promote the film which they made while they were still married. The skilled efforts of the film's publicist are somewhat hampered by the attitude of the director, whose priorities seem to lie elsewhere(n)

programme.title: The Straight Story
programme.desc: David Lynch, the director least likely to make a family film, pulls it off beautifully with this wholesome tale. Oscar nominee Richard Farnsworth stars as a septuagenarian who drives his lawn mower hundreds of miles to see his estranged, dying brother. Based on a true story. Harry Dean Stanton(n)

programme.title: Big Significant Things
programme.desc: In this dramedy a twentysomething guy, Craig (Harry Lloyd) is about to move across the country and buy a house with his longtime girlfriend, Ella (Krista Kosonen). However instead of preparing for life in a new city he embarks on a road trip that he always dreamed of taking and tells his girlfriend he's on a last minute business trip. Craig's itinerary includes stops at some of the world's largest roadside attractions (largest cedar bucket, largest rocking chair) but unexpected events could potentially derail him. Feature directorial debut for writer/director Bryan Reisberg(n)

programme.title: Gringo: The Dangerous Life of John McAfee
programme.desc: The stranger-than-fiction saga of John McAfee, the computer antivirus software mogul who decamped to a heavily fortified jungle compound in Belize, where his libertine lifestyle was interrupted by allegations he had murdered his neighbor in 2012. His subsequent flight to Guatemala and later foray into United States politics is retold by Academy Award-nominated documentarian Nanette Burstein(n)

programme.title: Body
programme.desc: Three female college students break into a mansion they thought was unoccupied, and mistakenly kill the groundskeeper. Their friendship begins to implode as they try to decide what to do with the body(n)

programme.title: Last Knights
programme.desc: In this action-packed medieval tale, a skilled warrior and his small clan fight back against an oppressive ruler in order to avenge the murder of their master(n)

programme.title: Meskada

Meskada (named for the county that contains both Hilliard and Caswell) also stars Norman Reedus, Kellan Lutz, Jonathan Tucker, and Grace Gummer(n)

programme.title: Killing Season
programme.desc: An ex-soldier tracks down a fellow veteran of the Bosnian War in search of revenge, leading to a showdown in the Appalachian Mountains(n)

programme.title: Out of the Furnace
programme.desc: Rust Belt ex-con Russell is released from prison and must choose between escaping his life of poverty or saving his younger brother Rodney, who has fallen in with a dangerous crime ring(n)

programme.title: Triple 9
programme.desc: A pack of corrupt cops plan the murder of an innocent police officer as a way to distract law enforcement from their simultaneous heist across town, but their target survives the attack and rebounds to foil their plan(n)

programme.title: Shaquille O'Neal Presents: All Star Comedy Jam: Live From Sin City
programme.desc: Comedian and actor Lavell Crawford hosts this installment from Las Vegas, featuring Earthquake, Cocoa Brown, K-Dubb and Donnell Rawlings(n)

programme.title: Tale of Tales
programme.desc: In this adaptation of three 17th-century Italian fairy tales about troubled royals, a queen conceives a child by eating a monster's heart, a king grows obsessed with a pet flea and a ruler is bewitched by a woman with a beautiful singing voice(n)

programme.title: Battle Royale
programme.desc: In a future world, society is on the verge of collapsing and with ten million people out of work, the government is forced to drastic actions. Every year, one school class is kidnapped, taken to an isolated island and introduced to a "game" where the students must kill each other, leaving only one alive, or they will all die(n)

programme.title: Shriek If You Know What I Did Last Friday the 13th
programme.desc: In this clever spoof of horror flicks, a reporter investigates a string of murders at a high school. Meanwhile, the school's principal tries to protect his students by hiring a mall rent-a-cop to act as a security guard(n)

programme.title: Miss Potter
programme.desc: Whimsical drama based on the life of early 20th-century author Beatrix Potter, creator of Peter Rabbit. As a young woman, Potter rails against her parents' wishes for her to marry and settle down. Instead, she continues to write about and draw the animals she has adored since childhood. Her early attempts to find a publisher for her children's stories are unsuccessful, but an offer from a small firm will turn her into a literary phenomenon and lead to a meeting that will change her life. Dir: Chris Noonan(n)

programme.title: Pelé: Birth of a Legend
programme.desc: This biopic chronicles the incredible journey of Brazilian soccer star Pelé (played as a young boy by Leonardo Lima Carvalho, and as a teen by Kevin de Paula). Birth of a Legend focuses on his youth in the slums of São Paulo and his rapid ascension to the national team, where, at the age of just 17, he helped lead the squad to their first ever World Cup victory in 1958. Vincent D'Onofrio co-stars. Directed by Jeff and Michael Zimbalist(n)

programme.title: Domestic Disturbance
programme.desc: Frank Morrison watches helplessly as smooth but creepy Rick Barnes wins his ex-wife and son. Danny's a troubled kid who tends to lie, but Frank takes his suspicions seriously. Has Barnes really committed murder? Tense thriller(n)

programme.title: People Like Us
programme.desc: A businessman (Chris Pine) discovers a ruinous family secret during a return trip home to attend the funeral of his estranged father. In the wake of this life-altering revelation, he embarks on a transformative journey that will forever alter the way he looks at life, love, and family. Star Trek screenwriter Alex Kurtzman makes his feature directorial debut with this heartfelt drama co-written by Roberto Orci and Jody Lambert, and featuring Elizabeth Banks(n)

programme.title: Beyond the Sea
programme.desc: Director Lisandro Perez-Rey's documentary examines the 1980 Mariel Boatlift, which brought more than 100,000 Cubans to the shores of the U.S. The film includes archival footage and interviews with boatlift refugees(n)

programme.title: Tyler Perry's The Family That Preys
programme.desc: Alfre Woodard and Kathy Bates star in writer/director Tyler Perry's family drama about an upper-crust family and their working-class counterparts, who discover that scandal knows no social boundaries. Charlotte Cartwright (Bates) and Alice Pratt (Woodard) may be from different sides of the tracks, yet over the years they've managed to nurture a strong and healthy friendship. That friendship is put to the ultimate test, however, when their adult children begin to act out in ways that neither parent ever saw coming. Alice's daughter Andrea (Sanaa Lathan) is married to a trusting husband named Chris (Rockmond Dunbar), but lately she's been betraying that trust by sleeping with her boss, William (Cole Hauser), who just so happens to be Charlotte's son. William is married to Jillian (KaDee Strickland), and in addition to being unfaithful, he's also scheming to take over the role of COO at his mother's lucrative construction firm. Meanwhile, Alice's other daughter, Pam (Taraji P. Henson), and her husband, Ben (Perry), a faithful family man and construction worker, have both recognized that their family has strayed from the course of righteousness, and become determined to help their loved ones back on the right path. When paternity secrets, shady double dealings, and a series of other scandals become too much for Charlotte and Alice to take, the two women set out on a cross-country trip in order to clear their heads and devise a plan for saving their families(n)

programme.title: American Jihad
programme.desc: An examination of how young men are radicalized in the U.S. to commit terrorists acts and what can be done to prevent it(n)

programme.title: Tears of the Sun
programme.desc: A Special-Ops commander leads his team into the jungle of Nigeria to rescue a doctor who will only go with them if they agree to rescue 70 refugees too(n)

programme.title: No Escape
programme.desc: An American businessman relocates his family to Southeast Asia, but their lives are put in grave danger when they get caught up in a violent political uprising. As they attempt to reach the US embassy, they are aided by a mysterious British tourist(n)

programme.title: Steve Byrne: Tell the Damn Joke
programme.desc: Steve Byrne brings his signature style to Chicago with a comedy special that holds no punches and calls it like it is(n)

programme.title: Brand: A Second Coming
programme.desc: In this intriguing documentary profile, comedian Russell Brand is followed on his journey from addict to an activist whose goal is to encourage a worldwide economic revolution(n)

programme.title: Pelé: Birth of a Legend
programme.desc: This biopic chronicles the incredible journey of Brazilian soccer star Pelé (played as a young boy by Leonardo Lima Carvalho, and as a teen by Kevin de Paula). programme.title: Miami Vice
programme.desc: Miami detectives Crockett and Tubbs go undercover to break up a Colombian drug cartel in this stylish and exciting update of the trendy 1980s cop series(n)

programme.title: Perfect in '76
programme.desc: A look at the 1976 Indiana Hoosiers basketball team, led by coach Bobby Knight, that posted a perfect 32-0 record on their way to winning the NCAA national championship(n)

programme.title: Medium Raw: Night of the Wolf
programme.desc: The dangerous patients at a maximum-security mental hospital break free from their rooms during a power failure, and embark on a grisly murder rampage that's destined to be remembered as one of the worst ever committed. Fifteen years ago, an elusive serial killer known as The Wolf claimed the lives of 15 young girls. Thanks to the work of Detectives Elliott Carbon (John Rhys-Davies) and Johnny Morgan ( Andrew Cymek), The Wolf was eventually captured, locked up, and placed in the care of Dr. Parker (William B. Davis). When the facility loses power and the lights go dark, however, The Wolf and the rest of the inmates seize the opportunity to reclaim their freedom. Now trapped in these winding corridors with a rampaging gang of maniacs, madmen, and murderers, Johnny and Dr. Parker must fight to survive the night, and ensure that no one escapes before order is restored(n)

programme.title: The Ghost Writer
programme.desc: In this taut political thriller, a British screenwriter (Ewan McGregor) agrees to ghostwrite the memoirs of a retired prime minister, but after he takes the job the former political leader is accused of committing a war crime. As the writer uncovers facts that corroborate these suspicions, he begins to fear he might be killed, just like the man who worked on the memoirs before him. Directed by Roman Polanski. Pierce Brosnan, Tom Wilkinson, Olivia Williams(n)

programme.title: The Ladykillers
programme.desc: The Coen brothers' update of a comedy classic sees five bungling crooks falling foul of their landlady(n)

programme.title: Miami Vice
programme.desc: Miami detectives Crockett and Tubbs go undercover to break up a Colombian drug cartel in this stylish and exciting update of the trendy 1980s cop series(n)

programme.title: Strikeforce: Le vs. Morgan
programme.desc: Cung Le vs. Sam Morgan from 2007 in San Jose(n)

programme.title: Twin Peaks: Fire Walk with Me
programme.desc: The prequel to David Lynch's surreal TV series details events leading up to the murder of Laura Palmer(n)

programme.title: Pelé: Birth of a Legend
programme.desc: This biopic chronicles the incredible journey of Brazilian soccer star Pelé (played as a young boy by Leonardo Lima Carvalho, and as a teen by Kevin de Paula). Birth of a Legend focuses on his youth in the slums of São Paulo and his rapid ascension to the national team, where, at the age of just 17, he helped lead the squad to their first ever World Cup victory in 1958. Vincent D'Onofrio co-stars. Directed by Jeff and Michael Zimbalist(n)

programme.title: Premonition
programme.desc: Linda Hanson has a beautiful house, a loving husband and two adorable daughters. She soon realises it wasn't a dream and her world is turned upside down. Network Television Premiere(n)

She returns to her fiance, but the boy, certain she is the woman for his father, plots to bring them together. Romantic comedy, with Tom Hanks and Meg Ryan.(n)
