programme.title: Never Back Down
programme.desc: At his new high school, a rebellious teen is lured into an underground fight club, where he finds a mentor in a mixed martial arts veteran(n)

programme.title: Running Scared
programme.desc: Two Chicago cops travel to Florida in an attempt to bring down a lethal drug-dealer trying to make himself into a major kingpin(n)

programme.title: 88 Minutes
programme.desc: College professor Jack Gramm races to prove a man he testified against deserves to be on Death Row, saving his own life in the process(n)

programme.title: Fargo
programme.desc: A pregnant policewoman tries to determine how several murders and a kidnapping are linked to an unassuming car salesman(n)

programme.title: Outlander
programme.desc: The Garrison Commander. Claire is thrown for a loop when her surprise meeting with a British general is interrupted by the dangerous Captain Jack Randall, who suspects she is harbouring secrets(n)

programme.title: Black Sails
programme.desc: XXXVIII. Flint makes a final push to bring England to its knees; Silver seals his fate; Rackham confronts Rogers; and Nassau is changed forever(n)

programme.title: The Missing
programme.desc: The Mountain. The truth of the events leading up to Alice's return to Eckhausen in 2014 is finally revealed. Meanwhile, in 2016, Sam and Gemma are pulling together and join Julien in a desperate race against time, as they track Alice and Sophie's abductor from Germany all the way to the mountains of Switzerland(n)

programme.title: Money Monster
programme.desc: TV stock-market guru Lee Gates and his producer Patty are held hostage during a live broadcast by a man who lost his life's savings due to Gates' financial advice(n)

programme.title: In Her Shoes
programme.desc: Touching comedy drama based on Jennifer Weiner's bestselling book. A party girl clashes with her sensible sister after she sleeps with her boyfriend, then goes in search of their long-lost grandmother. Can the grandmother help the party girl reform her life and make it up to her elder sister?(n)

programme.desc: This beautifully photographed and engaging nature documentary follows the struggles of a young monkey mother to care for and raise her new baby in the wilds of Southern Asia(n)

programme.title: The Blackout Experiments
programme.desc: An in-depth look at an interactive horror show known as "Blackout," in which willing participants are subjected to terrifying experiences. This documentary profiles those who repeatedly engage in Blackout, examining what motivates them to do so(n)

programme.title: I Am Wrath
programme.desc: An engineer with a dark past (John Travolta) seeks revenge for his wife's murder, and teams with an old friend (Christopher Meloni) to locate the killers after the crooked cops assigned to the case fail to bring them to justice. Chuck Russell directed this action thriller(n)

programme.title: The Meddler
programme.desc: After the death of her husband, a woman named Marnie relocates to L.A. to be closer to her daughter Lori, a Hollywood screenwriter. While Lori frets about her mum's smothering ways, Marnie keeps getting involved in the lives of others(n)

programme.title: Keeping Up with the Steins
programme.desc: While 13-year-old Benjamin's wealthy Hollywood parents prepare an extravagant party for his Bar Mitzvah, he has other ideas and invites his estranged grandfather, whom his father has not seen for many years. With the help of Grandpa, he tries to figure out what it means to be a man(n)

programme.title: Under Suspicion
programme.desc: Gene Hackman is a respected tax lawyer who's called in by police captain Morgan Freeman, who's investigating the murder of a young girl, just to answer a few routine questions. But as Stephen Hopkins' (director of 24 ) film progresses, a psychological duel between the two men develops, one seeking the truth, the other seeking to hide it(n)

programme.title: Quarantine
programme.desc: A TV reporter and her cameraman, while on assignment, get confined to a quarantined apartment complex in Los Angeles that houses a mysterious secret. A remake of the 2007 Spanish horror film "REC"(n)

programme.title: Making a Killing: Guns, Greed, and the NRA
programme.desc: A study of the impact of gun sales in the United States(n)

programme.title: I, Robot
programme.desc: (2004) Set just three decades into the future, Alex Proyas's all-action science-fiction film is inspired by Isaac Asimov's 1950s short story. The science of robotics is so advanced that humanoid-looking servants have been developed, ready to obey any command from a human. When the chief designer of US Robotics, the biggest manufacturer of this new brand, is found dead in the company's atrium after a fall from the upper floor, it has all the hallmarks of suicide, and Chicago cop Del Spooner (Will Smith) is assigned to the case. But technophobe Spooner doesn't believe that all robots are harmless. Despite opposition from both his superiors and the company, he investigates further and soon his suspicions centre on one robot, Sonny (voiced by Alan Tudyk). Is "he" one of an army of conscious, violent robots ready to challenge their human masters? ; HD Wide(n)

programme.title: Tomorrowland
programme.desc: When a scientifically minded teenager (Britt Robertson) discovers a technologically advanced trinket that provides an astounding glimpse of the future, she enlists the help of a reclusive inventor (George Clooney) to make "Tomorrowland" a reality today(n)

programme.title: Galaxy Quest
programme.desc: Comedy sci-fi adventure in which the stars of a 1970s sci-fi show, now scraping a living through re-runs and sci-fi conventions, are beamed aboard an alien spacecraft. Believing the cast's heroic on-screen dramas are historical documents of real-life adventures, the band of aliens turn to the ailing celebrities for help in their quest to overcome the oppressive regime in their solar system. (R) (T) (Digital Dolby 5.1)(n)

programme.title: The Hot Chick
programme.desc: A carefree young woman wakes up to discover her greatest nightmare is a reality -- she's become trapped in the body of Rob Schneider -- in this shape-shifting comedy. Jessica (Rachel McAdams) is a beautiful teenager whose life would be the envy of any high school student -- she's head of the cheerleading squad, her boyfriend, Billy (Matthew Lawrence), is the quarterback of the football team, and she's pretty and popular enough to get nearly anyone to do what she wants. However, Jessica is soon to find out how the other half lives, in more ways than she counted upon; she shoplifts a pair of earrings from an shop specializing in African curios run by Mambuza (Angie Stone), unaware that they carry the curse of Princess Nawa. Thanks to the curse, the next morning Jessica awakes to find that her spirit has entered the body of Clive (Rob Schneider), a sweaty and hirsute small-time crook. As Jessica tries to figure out how she can return to her old body, she has to lead the cheerleading squad to victory and attend her senior prom while looking like a less-than-handsome 30-year-old man. Billy is understandably puzzled by the changes in Jessica, while her best friend, April (Anna Faris), finds her feelings about Jessica change a bit once she volunteers to be her prom date. The Hot Chick is the first theatrical feature for director Tom Brady; Brady co-wrote an earlier Schneider vehicle, The Animal, and was on the writing staff for his television series Men Behaving Badly(n)

programme.title: Starship Troopers
programme.desc: Gruesomely violent sci-fi satire in which the Earth is threatened by an enemy from outer space - regiments of giant insects. When an idealistic teenager enlists in the army, he is put through a brutal training programme to prepare him for the horrors of war. Sent to the distant planet Klendaathu, he finds himself fighting a brutal deadly enemy force. Featuring spectacular special effects(n)

programme.title: Spanglish
programme.desc: FILM (2004, Comedy drama) A Mexican housekeeper and her daughter move in with an affluent but dysfunctional American family, led by Adam Sandler(n)

programme.title: The Missing
programme.desc: The Mountain. The truth of the events leading up to Alice's return to Eckhausen in 2014 is finally revealed. programme.desc: XXXVIII. Flint makes a final push to bring England to its knees; Silver seals his fate; Rackham confronts Rogers; and Nassau is changed forever(n)

programme.title: Outlander
programme.desc: Through a Glass, Darkly. In the Season 2 premiere, Jamie and Claire arrive in France, where they hope to infiltrate the Jacobite rebellion and put a stop to the Battle of Culloden. Thrown into the plush world of French society, they experience court intrigue and struggle to make any headway politically(n)

programme.title: Outlander
programme.desc: Not in Scotland Anymore. Life in Paris is not without its trials as Jamie struggles to triumph over the traumas of his past. A fortunate meeting with Jacobite leader Prince Charles presents opportunities, while the Duke of Sandringham's presence brings complications(n)

programme.title: Outlander
programme.desc: Useful Occupations and Deceptions. Political machinations dominate most of Jamie's time, while Claire puts her healing skills to use. Their plan to stop Culloden moves along, but the forward momentum is jeopardized by past actions(n)

programme.title: Outlander
programme.desc: La Dame Blanche. Claire and Jamie throw an elaborate dinner party intended to derail investors in Prince Charles' war effort. Meanwhile, Claire's revelation that Jack Randall is alive sparks Jamie in an unexpected way as he and Claire struggle to regain their physical intimacy(n)

programme.title: Outlander
programme.desc: Untimely Resurrection. Jamie and Claire reunite and attempt to extinguish the fires, but Claire undertakes an unexpected change of course and their relationship is put to the test by a past event that comes back to haunt them(n)

programme.title: Outlander
programme.desc: Best Laid Schemes... Claire's medical knowledge is used to devise a plan to halt a deal that would fill the war chest, but she learns Jamie has reneged on his word, and that leads to problems for both of them(n)

programme.title: Outlander
programme.desc: Faith. Doctors at L'Hopital Des Anges try to save Claire's life and that of her unborn child, and King Louis accuses two men of practicing the dark arts(n)

programme.title: Outlander
programme.desc: The Fox's Lair. Claire and Jamie seek to elicit support from his manipulative grandfather, who may have his own interests at heart, while a visiting Colum MacKenzie has other plans(n)

programme.title: Outlander
programme.desc: Je Suis Prest. When Claire and Jamie are reunited with the Lallybroch and MacKenzie men who are in training, his power struggle and her personal battle prove a burden. But an Englishman's visit to the camp provides updated news(n)

programme.title: Outlander
programme.desc: Prestonpans. Jamie uses Claire's knowledge of the future to lead the Jacobite army into battle against the British, while Claire tends to the wounded, a harsh reminder of the cost of war(n)

programme.title: Outlander
programme.desc: Vengeance Is Mine. Jacobite leaders decide to halt the march on London and send Claire and the Highlanders up north, where a troop of redcoats is making trouble for the Scots(n)

programme.title: Outlander
programme.desc: The Hail Mary. Jamie pulls out all stops in an effort in turn the Jacobite army away from impending slaughter, while Claire comforts the ailing Alex Randall(n)

programme.title: Outlander
programme.desc: Dragonfly in Amber. The Season 2 finale flashes forward to the present, where Claire reveals the truth to her daughter, Brianna, while in the 18 century, the Battle of Culloden arrives and Jamie pulls out all stops to save his loved ones(n)

programme.title: The Missing
programme.desc: The Mountain. The truth of the events leading up to Alice's return to Eckhausen in 2014 is finally revealed. Meanwhile, in 2016, Sam and Gemma are pulling together and join Julien in a desperate race against time, as they track Alice and Sophie's abductor from Germany all the way to the mountains of Switzerland(n)

programme.title: The Lovely Bones
programme.desc: After bringing Middle-earth to life Peter Jackson turned his attention to Alice Sebold's best-selling novel. From difficult source material (the story starts with the rape and murder of a 14-year-old girl), Jackson's contemporary fantasy drama sees the recently deceased Susie Salmon (confidently played by Saoirse Ronan) watch the aftermath of her brutal murder from on high as her killer (Stanley Tucci turning in a master class in creepiness) prepares for his next attack. Jackson does a terrific job with much-loved and complex source material and his depiction of Susie's sometimes harrowing, sometimes beautiful afterlife lives long in the memory(n)

programme.title: Made of Honor
programme.desc: A handsome and successful bachelor is taken aback when his dream girl asks him to be the maid of honor in her upcoming wedding(n)

programme.title: She's the One
programme.desc: In this wry rom-com, the romantic complications of two Irish-Catholic brothers living in New York City become interconnected and betrayal takes hold(n)

programme.title: Only the Strong Survive
programme.desc: Roger Friedman is an entertainment journalist and music fan with a particular love for R&B and soul music from the mid-'50s to the pre-disco era of the early '70s. Owing in part to segregated booking policies and simple lack of proper archiving, Friedman discovered there is little or no surviving film footage or videotape of many of the greatest artists of the era performing on-stage. However, a large number of the performers in question were still active and performing on a regular basis, and with the help of documentary filmmakers Chris Hegedus and D.A. Pennebaker, Friedman set out to capture some of his favorites on film while they were still in good form. Only the Strong Survive features knockout performances from such R&B legends as Wilson Pickett, Jerry Butler, the Chi-Lites, Carla Thomas, Mary Wilson, Ann Peebles, and many more, as well as interviews in which the artists discuss the ups and downs of their lives in music. Only the Strong Survive also features performance footage of Memphis R&B pioneer Rufus Thomas, who had passed on at the age of 84, less than two months before the film was screened at the 2002 Sundance Film Festival(n)

programme.title: One More Time
programme.desc: In this touching drama, a musician reeling from personal and professional disappointments moves into the Hamptons home of her father, a Sinatra-esque crooner still hoping to make a career comeback. In time, father and daughter bond while seeking success in the music industry(n)

programme.title: The Salt of the Earth
programme.desc: Profiling Brazilian photojournalist Sebastião Salgado, whose black-and-white portraits often focused on third-world countries and impoverished communities(n)

programme.title: Jimmy's Hall
programme.desc: Political activist Jimmy Gralton returns to his hometown in Ireland in 1932 following a 10-year exile in America. He decides to reopen a community hall with the help of the locals, but faces opposition from both the government and a crotchety priest, who suspect the hall is a hotbed for loose morals and communist activity(n)

programme.title: The Dresser
programme.desc: During World War II, the backstage hand of a touring Shakespearean theatre company struggles to support the brilliant but tyrannical head of the company(n)

programme.title: Hotel Rwanda
programme.desc: Director: Terry George. The true-life story of Paul Rusesabagina, a hotel manager who housed over a thousand Tutsi refugees during their struggle against the Hutu militia in Rwanda(n)

programme.title: The Sound and the Fury
programme.desc: James Franco directs this adaptation of William Faulkner's The Sound and the Fury, the writer's tale of the Compson family, a once wealthy Southern clan devolving into obscurity. Tim Blake Nelson portrays the patriarch, a boozy lawyer who oversees the lives of his children with cynical monologues delivered through an alcoholic haze. Quentin, the oldest child, goes to Harvard, but he's very close with Caddy, the only daughter in the family who has a child out of wedlock. Second son Jason attempts to rule the family with an iron fist, but he's full of resentment towards Caddy's bastard child. All of them attempt to care for the developmentally disabled Benjy (Franco). Franco employs a fractured approach to the narrative in an attempt to capture Faulkner's distinctive prose style. The Sound and the Fury screened at the 2014 Toronto International Film Festival(n)

programme.title: One More Time
programme.desc: In this touching drama, a musician reeling from personal and professional disappointments moves into the Hamptons home of her father, a Sinatra-esque crooner still hoping to make a career comeback. In time, father and daughter bond while seeking success in the music industry(n)

programme.title: Meet Joe Black
programme.desc: The Grim Reaper grants a tycoon a few extra days of life in this remake of 1934's "Death Takes a Holiday"(n)

programme.title: Pride and Prejudice and Zombies
programme.desc: In an alternate 19th century English countryside, a fast-spreading zombie plague is threatening to bring the world to an end. Elizabeth Bennet who is trained in martial arts teams up with Mr Darcy to battle the zombie apocalypse, and discover their love for one another(n)

programme.title: Hedwig and the Angry Inch
programme.desc: John Cameron Mitchell co-wrote, directed and stars in this adaptation of his off-Broadway play about the trials and tribulations of an embittered transsexual rock singer touring the country(n)

programme.title: Lambert & Stamp
programme.desc: This eye-opening documentary profiles Kit Lambert and Chris Stamp, two filmmakers who became the managers of the rock band the Who(n)

programme.title: Every Secret Thing
programme.desc: This haunting mystery thriller follows a detective desperately searching for a missing child. The prime suspects are two teenage girls, who were recently released from prison for committing a similar and unspeakable crime(n)

programme.title: Fathers and Daughters
programme.desc: Jake raises his daughter Katie on his own after his wife died in a fatal car accident and he suffered a mental breakdown. He struggles with the daily routines he has to go through to make sure she lives happily. His relatives intend to take Katie away from him but Jake knows that he has to hold on to the one thing that he loves the most - his daughter(n)

programme.title: Nick & Norah's Infinite Playlist
programme.desc: Michael Cera and Kat Dennings add charismatic spark to this enjoyable romantic comedy. They play the title characters, a heartsick musician and a young indie-rock fan who asks him to be her boyfriend in an attempt to put off an annoying classmate. What starts out as just a ploy turns into a most memorable and eventful night on the town. Ari Graynor is a blast as Norah's drunken party-hearty pal who winds up getting lost. Alexis Dziena, Aaron Yoo, Jay Baruchel. Directed by Peter Sollett(n)

programme.title: Father of Invention
programme.desc: In this poignant comedy, disgraced businessman Robert Axle works as a janitor after serving a prison sentence for gross negligence, and eventually he decides to rebuild his fortune by creating a new gadget(n)

programme.title: Saint Laurent
programme.desc: This fascinating biopic of visionary French clothing designer Yves Saint Laurent focuses on his cutting-edge work during the 1960s and '70s(n)

programme.title: Marie Antoinette
programme.desc: Stylish historical romp through the court of Versailles, following an Austrian duchess's rise to become the decadent and outrageous Queen of France that would fall with the dawn of the revolution(n)

programme.title: Pride and Prejudice and Zombies
programme.desc: In an alternate 19th century English countryside, a fast-spreading zombie plague is threatening to bring the world to an end. Elizabeth Bennet who is trained in martial arts teams up with Mr Darcy to battle the zombie apocalypse, and discover their love for one another(n)

programme.title: I Saw the Light
programme.desc: This deeply personal biopic of country-music legend Hank Williams chronicles his tumultuous life—from his marriage to aspiring singer Audrey Mae Sheppard to his residency at the Grand Ole Opry—as he struggles with alcoholism and addiction(n)

programme.title: Hart's War
programme.desc: Bruce Willis is the leader of a group of defiant soldiers plotting an elaborate escape from a German POW camp during WWII(n)

programme.title: Nick & Norah's Infinite Playlist
programme.desc: Michael Cera and Kat Dennings add charismatic spark to this enjoyable romantic comedy. They play the title characters, a heartsick musician and a young indie-rock fan who asks him to be her boyfriend in an attempt to put off an annoying classmate. What starts out as just a ploy turns into a most memorable and eventful night on the town. Ari Graynor is a blast as Norah's drunken party-hearty pal who winds up getting lost. Alexis Dziena, Aaron Yoo, Jay Baruchel. Directed by Peter Sollett(n)

programme.title: Marie Antoinette
programme.desc: Stylish historical romp through the court of Versailles, following an Austrian duchess's rise to become the decadent and outrageous Queen of France that would fall with the dawn of the revolution(n)

programme.title: Infinitely Polar Bear
programme.desc: A man who is bipolar attempts to win back his estranged wife by taking care of their two young, spirited daughters(n)

programme.title: The Evening Star
programme.desc: The emotional sequel to Terms of Endearment, which traces the ever-problematic world of Aurora Greenway (Shirley MacLaine). With her daughter now dead, Aurora finds herself trying to raise her three grandchildren single-handedly. Fortunately, help is at hand from her housekeeper Rosie (Marion Ross), but nothing is ever simple in the Greenway household(n)

programme.title: The Perez Family
programme.desc: Old and new loves are turned upside down through a complex case of mistaken identities in this romantic comedy-drama. In 1980, Juan Raul Perez (Alfred Molina) is released from a Cuban prison after spending 20 years behind bars and is allowed to join a mass emigration to the U.S. While Juan was incarcerated, his wife Carmela Perez (Anjelica Huston) escaped to Florida with their daughter, and Juan lives for the day when they can be reunited. En route to Miami, Juan meets Dottie Perez (Marisa Tomei), a fiery young woman who wants to leave behind her career as a prostitute. Juan and Carmela miss finding each other when his boat reaches Miami, and immigration personnel mistakenly assume that Juan and Dottie Perez are husband and wife; when they learn that families tend to find American sponsors much faster than individuals, they play along with the mistake, even convincing other Perezes to pose as their child and grandfather. Juan discovers that trying to renew an old relationship isn't easy as one tries to start a new life, especially since Carmela has attracted the attentions of police lieutenant John Pirelli (Chazz Palminteri). Cuban jazz legend Arturo Sandoval contributed to the soundtrack(n)

programme.title: This Christmas
programme.desc: Festive comedy-drama. An estranged family reunite for the first Christmas in several years. Tensions arise as each member brings their own problems and opinions, but the family also rediscover how much they have in common(n)

programme.title: City Island
programme.desc: A dysfunctional New York family find their web of secrets and lies exacerbated by the arrival of a mysterious house guest(n)

programme.title: Four Weddings and a Funeral
programme.desc: Hapless Hugh Grant hesitantly romances Andie MacDowell in this Brit comedy classic penned by Richard Curtis. Contains strong language and sexual scenes. (1994)(117 mins)(n)

programme.title: Jay and Silent Bob Strike Back
programme.desc: Anarchic comedy in which a pair of eccentric New Jersey slackers head to Hollywood after discovering that a film is being made featuring superheroes based on their likenesses. As they head west, a series of misadventures befalls them, including close encounters with a group of glamorous jewel thieves and an orangutan(n)

programme.title: This Christmas
programme.desc: Festive comedy-drama. An estranged family reunite for the first Christmas in several years. Tensions arise as each member brings their own problems and opinions, but the family also rediscover how much they have in common(n)

programme.title: First Sunday
programme.desc: Tyler Perry-style uplift meets attitude in popular playwright-turned-moviemaker David Talbert's urban-themed comedy. Ice Cube and Tracy Morgan star as inept Baltimore crooks who plan to rob a church but find an insider has beaten them to it. They take the choir and church officials hostage in hopes of unmasking the thief in holier-than-thou clothing(n)

programme.title: The House Bunny
programme.desc: Ex-Playboy Bunny Shelley Darlingson causes campus chaos when she joins a sorority of geeky girls and helps them turn their love lives around(n)

programme.title: Get a Job
programme.desc: In this timely comedy about millennial malaise, a couple who recently graduated from college try to hack it in the real world. He learns that his writing internship will no longer lead to a job, while she is laid off from her first post-grad position(n)

programme.title: Jay and Silent Bob Strike Back
programme.desc: Anarchic comedy in which a pair of eccentric New Jersey slackers head to Hollywood after discovering that a film is being made featuring superheroes based on their likenesses. As they head west, a series of misadventures befalls them, including close encounters with a group of glamorous jewel thieves and an orangutan(n)

programme.title: Cheech and Chong's The Corsican Brothers
programme.desc: A tongue-in-cheek adaptation of Alexandre Dumas' well-known short story about a set of nineteenth century twins whose lives are ruled by a vendetta conceived well before their birth. One twin is, of course, the intellectual, contemplative sort - while the other is aggressive and spiteful. The kicker in this version, however, is that they are portrayed by Cheech and Chong(n)

programme.title: Fired Up!
programme.desc: This peppy and uproarious teen romp is boosted by excellent performances from Nicholas D'Agosto and Eric Christian Olsen as Illinois high-school football stars who bag summer camp in red-hot Texas to try their luck at cheerleading camp instead. With 300 young ladies to hit on, it becomes more of a booty camp than boot camp for the two young lotharios. But before they know it, both get more involved, romantically and athletically, than they expected. Molly Sims. Directed by Will Gluck(n)

programme.title: How to Kill Your Neighbor's Dog
programme.desc: Somewhere in L.A., Peter (Kenneth Branagh), a washed-up British playwright, struggles to duplicate his past glory as he surfs a foul-smelling tide of disenchantment. His wife, Melanie (Robin Wright Penn), manages to maintain an optimistic outlook even as she longs for the baby that her husband is hesitant to help her conceive. When Peter befriends Amy (Suzi Hofrichter), a neighborhood girl who has mild cerebral palsy, their friendship softens him to the idea of fatherhood and propels Melanie's maternal yearnings into hyperdrive. As if baby fever weren't enough, Peter is plagued by a seemingly benevolent stalker (Jared Harris), his neighbors' incessantly noisy dog, and the flighty cast and crew of his latest play(n)

programme.title: PCU
programme.desc: Actor Hart Bochner turns director in the satirical Animal House update P.C.U.. Per the title, the film takes place on the campus of a University where, thanks to militant dean Jessica Walter, Political Correctness has reached ridiculous proportions. A group of dorm-room cutups, wallowing in their uncorrectness, declares war on the uptight student activists who call the shots. Saturday Night Live's David Spade is among the leading players; while he's funnier here than in his costarring stints in Chris Farley's films, he doesn't have much to work with. The subject matter covered in P.C.U. has already been tackled, with far funnier results, on Bill Maher's cable-TV weekly Politically Incorrect(n)

programme.title: First Sunday
programme.desc: Tyler Perry-style uplift meets attitude in popular playwright-turned-moviemaker David Talbert's urban-themed comedy. Ice Cube and Tracy Morgan star as inept Baltimore crooks who plan to rob a church but find an insider has beaten them to it. They take the choir and church officials hostage in hopes of unmasking the thief in holier-than-thou clothing(n)

programme.title: The Perfect Holiday
programme.desc: Gabrielle Union, Morris Chestnut, Queen Latifah, and Terrence Howard star in a film concerning a young girl who implores a department-store Santa to find a new husband for her divorced mother for Christmas. Single mother of three Nancy (Union) has been putting the needs of her three children ahead of her own for as far back as she can remember, and lately her youngest daughter, Emily (Khail Bryant), has become acutely aware of her mother's palpable sadness. As Christmas draws near, Nancy takes her kids to the mall for a cheerful visit with jolly old Saint Nick. When it comes time for Emily's turn to sit on Santa's lap and make her Christmas wish, she selflessly remembers her mother's recent comment that a compliment from a man would be the best gift of all. Determined to make her mother happy again even if it means sacrificing her own wish, Emily relays the message to Santa (Chestnut), not realizing that the man beneath the beard is actually an office-supply salesman and ambitious singer/songwriter named Benjamin. Recognizing the daughter's love for her mother and sensing something truly special in Nancy, Benjamin cheerfully obliges the young girl, setting into motion a series of events that promise to make this the most memorable holiday in quite some time. Lance Rivera directs a film produced by Shakim Compere and Latifah through Flavor Unit Entertainment(n)

programme.desc: Comedy about a millionaire who goes back to college with his son to show him why and how he should experience the student lifestyle, by throwing the best parties and knowing the right people(n)

programme.title: Stripes
programme.desc: Bill Murray and Harold Ramis star in this comedy as two friends who, bored with their jobs, decide to join the army(n)

programme.title: Nurse
programme.desc: By day, Abby Russell is a dedicated nurse. By night, she punishes cheating men with brutal deaths(n)

programme.title: The Bleeding
programme.desc: In this action-packed horror shocker, former Army ranger Shawn Black (Michael Matthias) hunts the vampires that killed his family and embraces his true potential as a slayer with the help of a mysterious priest named Reverend Ray(n)

programme.title: Call Me Kuchu
programme.desc: At a time when Ugandan lawmakers have proposed a bill to make homosexuality punishable by death, filmmakers Katherine Fairfax Wright and Malika Zouhali-Worrall profile the country's first openly gay man and a religious leader who have put their lives on the line to fight for equality. In Uganda homosexuals are known as "kuchus" and face brutal discrimination for their sexual orientation. Amidst swelling anti-homosexual sentiments in both the government and the local communities, activist David Kato comes out as openly gay, and wages a valiant fight to repeal his country's fiercely homophobic laws. Meanwhile, Bishop Christopher Senyonjo, a rare religious supporter of gay rights in Uganda, finds himself excommunicated from the church over his support of the LGBT community. Later, when David is brutally murdered just weeks after a notable legal victory for the community, a new generation of gay advocates begins to rise up, and challenge their oppressors(n)

programme.title: Day of the Dead
programme.desc: A mysterious virus has infected the small town of Leadville, Colorado, and the military is brought in to enforce a quarantine and stop the spread of the disease. As people perish, survivors realize that the virus is creating the walking dead who crave human flesh. Only a small number of people are immune to the virus, and those few survivors must battle to fend off the infected zombies while trying to make it out of town alive(n)

programme.title: The Minus Man
programme.desc: Notable as the directorial debut of Blade Runner co-scripter Hampton Fancher, this darkly comic thriller stars affable Owen Wilson as Vann Siegert, a different brand of serial killer: one who actually believes he's doing his deeply depressed victims a service of mercy. Wandering up the West Coast, Vann chooses victims from a parade of colorful social misfits -- including a haggard junkie (singer Sheryl Crow) whose pain he ends with a nip from his flask of poison amaretto -- and expounds on his motives with a pocket tape recorder (a drawling monologue that serves as the film's narrative voice-over). A brief layover in Owensville eventually finds Vann in the company of quarreling middle-aged couple Doug and Jane (Brian Cox and Mercedes Ruehl), who grow fond of the young drifter's amiable demeanor and take him on as a boarder. After landing a job at the local post office, Vann catches the eye of co-worker Ferrin (Janeane Garofalo), and a tentative romance blossoms -- but even love can't distract Vann from his crusade to terminate people's unhappiness: "They come to me like moths, because I shine," he explains. Though not the complex psychological game it purports to be, The Minus Man is an intriguing character study -- imagine a kindler, gentler version of Henry: Portrait of a Serial Killer -- with some clever twists and fine performances, including a touching portrayal from the usually acerbic Garofalo. Geared more to the art-movie crowd than to fans of Hitchcockian thrills, this film opened to raves at the 1999 Sundance Film Festival(n)

programme.title: The Bleeding
programme.desc: In this action-packed horror shocker, former Army ranger Shawn Black (Michael Matthias) hunts the vampires that killed his family and embraces his true potential as a slayer with the help of a mysterious priest named Reverend Ray(n)

programme.title: Devil
programme.desc: Chris Messina headlines this thriller produced by M. Night Shyamalan about a group of strangers who are trapped in an elevator together and come to the realization that one of them is the Devil. Directed by John Erick Dowdle(n)

programme.title: Bad Company
programme.desc: One of the CIA's finest agents is killed in Prague in the middle of an operation to stop East European terrorists. His identical twin brother, New York ticket scalper Jake Hayes, is recruited to complete the mission. But Jake isn't convinced that suits and guns are his thing. Espionage thriller with a comic edge(n)

programme.title: In the Mix
programme.desc: R&B star Usher Raymond plays his first starring role in this story which blends crime with romantic comedy. Darrell (Usher Raymond) is a successful club DJ who one night unexpectedly rescues a woman from a dangerous situation. It turns out the woman in question is the wife of Frank Pacelli (Chazz Palminteri), one of New York City's most powerful mobsters. To show his appreciation, Pacelli gives Darrell a job -- serving as bodyguard for this beautiful daughter, Dolly (Emmanuelle Chriqui). A short-lived romance blooms between Darrell and Dolly, but it isn't long before the couple are quarreling, which makes Pacelli more than a bit unhappy with his new hire. However, Pacelli also has a mob war and a disloyal and ambitious young lieutenant to deal with, and Darrell soon finds Pacelli's problems become his problems too. Also starring Kevin Hart and Robert Davi, In the Mix was produced under the title Dying for Dolly(n)

programme.title: The Glass Shield
programme.desc: Police thriller about a pair of rookie cops who find themselves victims of corruption within their own force. The first black officer in the Sheriff's Department struggles against the racially-hostile attitudes of the other officers, but finds an ally in the only female member of the department. When their colleagues accuse an innocent man of murder, the precinct's two outsiders have to question their loyalties carefully(n)

programme.title: The Minus Man
programme.desc: Notable as the directorial debut of Blade Runner co-scripter Hampton Fancher, this darkly comic thriller stars affable Owen Wilson as Vann Siegert, a different brand of serial killer: one who actually believes he's doing his deeply depressed victims a service of mercy. programme.title: Planet Terror
programme.desc: Robert Rodriguez ("Sin City") wrote and directed this rip-roaring homage to gory exploitation flicks, centering on a rag-tag group fighting for their lives after a bio-weapon mishap creates an army of flesh-eating zombies(n)

programme.title: Beat Street
programme.desc: A group of Bronx teens in the early years of hip-hop attempt to break into show business(n)

programme.title: Avengers: Age of Ultron
programme.desc: The Avengers reassemble to put a stop to the evil Ultron's villainous plans before it is too late(n)

programme.desc: Chris Messina headlines this thriller produced by M. Night Shyamalan about a group of strangers who are trapped in an elevator together and come to the realization that one of them is the Devil. Directed by John Erick Dowdle(n)

programme.title: Shaquille O'Neal Presents: All Star Comedy Jam - Live From Atlanta
programme.desc: Faizon Love hosts an evening of stand-up comedy routines. Performers include: Red Grant; Finesse Mitchell; Gina Yashere; Robert Powell; and Lavar Walker(n)

programme.title: The Way of the Gun
programme.desc: A violent crime thriller from the writer of The Usual Suspects. A pair of criminals (Benicio Del Toro and Ryan Phillippe) kidnap a pregnant woman (Juliette Lewis) who is acting as surrogate mother for a rich and powerful gangster. When their demands for a ransom aren't met, the pair are ruthlessly pursued across Mexico by the gangster's henchmen in a cat-and-mouse chase that leads to a gruesome bloodbath. Who will survive when the bullets start flying? Also stars James Caan and Taye Diggs(n)

programme.title: Pawn
programme.desc: A cop stumbles into a robbery at a 24-hour diner, resulting in an explosive hostage situation in this twisting tale of crime and betrayal starring Forest Whitaker, Michael Chiklis, Common and Ray Liotta(n)

programme.title: The Game Plan
programme.desc: Narcissistic football player Joe 'The King' Kingman thinks he has it all, then he finds out his ex-wife never told him about their daughter. But is he ready for the responsibility? Comedy(n)

programme.title: Honey
programme.desc: Dance teacher Honey lives in a tough neighbourhood and dreams of the big time which may come her way when she is offered a break by a music video director. But the director's motives are not altogether altruistic and the fame Honey craves may come at too high a price(n)

programme.title: Avengers: Age of Ultron
programme.desc: The Avengers reassemble to put a stop to the evil Ultron's villainous plans before it is too late(n)

programme.title: Impostor
programme.desc: This long-delayed science fiction thriller from director Gary Fleder was actually filmed prior to his box-office hit Don't Say a Word (2001), which preceded it in theaters by several months. Based on a 1953 short story by Philip K. Dick, the film shares that schizophrenic author's long-running obsessions with concealed identity and humanity's potential inferiority to alternative life forms. Gary Sinise stars as Spencer John Olham, a respected government scientist in the year 2079 trying to devise a secret weapon that will help his fellow humans win a decade-long war with invading aliens that are cloning human subjects and using the replicas as walking time bombs. Suddenly, Olham is accused of being an alien spy and a nationwide manhunt to capture him ensues. With even his doctor wife (Madeleine Stowe) unsure that she can trust him, Olham must uncover the truth on his own, even as he's relentlessly pursued by Hathaway (Vincent D'Onofrio), a federal agent charged with destroying the clones. Imposter has a complicated history, originally produced in early 2000 as a 30-minute short to be included in an anthology entitled "The Light Years Trilogy," a project that never got off the ground. So impressed was Dimension Films with the completed piece, however, that the footage was incorporated into a new feature version. That film was then shuffled around the release schedule for more than a year as effects were completed, reshoots were ordered, and the film was recut for a PG-13 rating instead of its original R. The R-rated "director's cut" was later released on DVD(n)

programme.title: The Game Plan
programme.desc: Narcissistic football player Joe 'The King' Kingman thinks he has it all, then he finds out his ex-wife never told him about their daughter. But is he ready for the responsibility? Comedy(n)

programme.title: Jarhead
programme.desc: US Marine Anthony Swofford may be a top sniper, but will he ever get to take the shot he's been trained for? War drama(n)

programme.title: Avengers: Age of Ultron
programme.desc: The Avengers reassemble to put a stop to the evil Ultron's villainous plans before it is too late(n)

programme.title: Mad Money
programme.desc: A charming-as-ever Diane Keaton stars as a desperate housewife who gets a job as a janitor at the Kansas City Federal Reserve Bank, where she and two other low-level employees (Queen Latifah, Katie Holmes) devise a plan to steal a fortune in old bills already marked for shredding. Oscar-winning screenwriter Callie Khouri ("Thelma & Louise") directed. Diane Keaton, Queen Latifah, Katie Holmes(n)

programme.title: Bye Bye, Love
programme.desc: A comedy about three single dads with weekend custody of their children who discover that, even though marriages end, familes last forever(n)

programme.title: Fever Pitch
programme.desc: Nick Hornby's acclaimed memoir about one man's struggle to balance his love of a woman and his love for soccer was the basis of a well-reviewed British film in 1997, and now gets a Americanized rewrite with this picture, in which the game is changed from soccer to baseball. Ben (Jimmy Fallon) is a high-school teacher who meets Lindsay (Drew Barrymore), who has a successful career in business. Ben and Lindsay don't appear to have much in common on the surface, but they hit it off and are soon involved in a serious romance. But when spring rolls around, Lindsay becomes aware of the true love of Ben's life -- the Boston Red Sox. Despite the team's lamentable record, Ben has been a fiercely loyal Red Sox fan since childhood, and Lindsay finds it hard to compete with his passion for baseball, while Ben is forced to choose between the obsessions of his youth and the enthusiasms of a responsible adult. Fever Pitch was shot in part in Boston during the 2004 baseball season, which to the surprise of the filmmakers saw the Red Sox winning baseball's world series for the first time since 1918(n)

programme.title: Tuck Everlasting
programme.desc: A teenage girl meets her dream man in the woods. To her surprise, he reveals that he is immortal - but when he offers her the chance to join him forever, she is not so sure(n)

programme.title: The Land Before Time IV: Journey Through the Mists
programme.desc: The baby dinosaurs head deep into a chilly swampland in search of a Night Flower, the only plant that will cure Littlefoot's ailing grandad(n)

programme.title: Franny's Feet
programme.desc: Princess Tia; Chez Lou Lou. Franny meets a princess who needs to learn consideration; she encounters a French poodle in need of more playtime(n)

programme.title: Connie the Cow
programme.sub-title: The Big Surprise; The Selfish Butterflies; Looking for the Colour Yellow
programme.desc: The Big Surprise; The Selfish Butterflies; Looking for the Colour Yellow. Connie's friends surprise her; Connie talks to butterflies about being selfish; Grandma Clara teaches a game about color(n)

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington Bear
programme.sub-title: Paddington Goes to the Dentist; Paddington's Dinosaurs; Paddington's First Light
programme.desc: Paddington Goes to the Dentist; Paddington's Dinosaurs; Paddington's First Light. Paddington breaks a tooth and must go to the family dentist, who learns that bears are not easy patients(n)

programme.title: Sabrina, the Animated Series
programme.desc: I Got Glue Babe. Harvey asks Sabrina and Gem to both come to the amusement park, and Sabrina realizes that she must learn to get along with Gem. She casts a togetherness spell, but things go wrong and everyone ends up getting stuck together(n)

programme.title: Liberty's Kids
programme.desc: In Praise of Ben. A look at the life and inventions of Benjamin Franklin (voice of Walter Cronkite); Sarah returns to Philadelphia and reunites with Moses, James and Henri. Voices include Reo Jones (Sarah), Chris Lundquist (James), Kathleen Barr (Henri) and D. Kevin Williams (Moses)(n)

programme.title: Land Before Time V: The Mysterious Island
programme.desc: Littlefoot, Cera, Petrie, Ducky and Spike try to help their families by finding food and a safe place to stay while the Great Valley recovers from a locust attack(n)

programme.title: The Good Dinosaur
programme.desc: In this enchanting computer-animated fantasy, set in a world where the dinosaurs never went extinct, an amiable young Apatosaurus named Arlo (voiced by Raymond Ochoa) loses his father in a storm and is swept away by a vicious river current, stranding him in a frightening new place far from his home. He soon embarks on a journey to reunite with his family, and befriends a prehistoric human child known as Spot (Jack Bright) along the way.Peter Sohn directed this heartwarming Pixar adventure, with Jeffrey Wright, Frances McDormand, Anna Paquin, and Sam Elliott also contributing voice work(n)

programme.title: Dirt Girl World
programme.desc: Antics. Dirtgirl and her friends learn about ants(n)

programme.title: Bobby Jones: Stroke of Genius
programme.desc: Based on the real-life story of golf legend Bobby Jones, Bobby Jones, Stroke of Genius features Jim Caviezel as the temperamental but highly talented amateur who threw a wrench in the golf world of the mid-'20s. Though Jones would eventually become the founder of the internationally renowned Augusta National Golf Club, which is father to the prestigious annual tournament known as The Masters, the combination of his ambition and tumultuous relationship with the media interfered with his personal life to such an extent that his future in the sport seemed doomed. With the help of his wife, Mary Malone Jones (Claire Forlani), the gifted, oftentimes tortured golfer was forced to balance his family life and the public scrutiny regarding his golf career, lest both of them dissolve entirely. Directed by Rowdy Herrington, the film also stars Jeremy Northam, Aidan Quinn, and Malcolm McDowell(n)

programme.title: Fever Pitch
programme.desc: Nick Hornby's acclaimed memoir about one man's struggle to balance his love of a woman and his love for soccer was the basis of a well-reviewed British film in 1997, and now gets a Americanized rewrite with this picture, in which the game is changed from soccer to baseball. Ben (Jimmy Fallon) is a high-school teacher who meets Lindsay (Drew Barrymore), who has a successful career in business. Ben and Lindsay don't appear to have much in common on the surface, but they hit it off and are soon involved in a serious romance. But when spring rolls around, Lindsay becomes aware of the true love of Ben's life -- the Boston Red Sox. Despite the team's lamentable record, Ben has been a fiercely loyal Red Sox fan since childhood, and Lindsay finds it hard to compete with his passion for baseball, while Ben is forced to choose between the obsessions of his youth and the enthusiasms of a responsible adult. Fever Pitch was shot in part in Boston during the 2004 baseball season, which to the surprise of the filmmakers saw the Red Sox winning baseball's world series for the first time since 1918(n)

programme.title: The Good Dinosaur
programme.desc: In this enchanting computer-animated fantasy, set in a world where the dinosaurs never went extinct, an amiable young Apatosaurus named Arlo (voiced by Raymond Ochoa) loses his father in a storm and is swept away by a vicious river current, stranding him in a frightening new place far from his home. He soon embarks on a journey to reunite with his family, and befriends a prehistoric human child known as Spot (Jack Bright) along the way.Peter Sohn directed this heartwarming Pixar adventure, with Jeffrey Wright, Frances McDormand, Anna Paquin, and Sam Elliott also contributing voice work(n)

programme.title: The Pink Panther 2
programme.desc: Hollywood funnyman Steve Martin returns to the role made famous by Peter Sellers in this high-concept sequel to the 2006 comedy hit The Pink Panther. The world's most valuable treasures are being stolen. The legendary Pink Panther Diamond is the latest to disappear, and Chief Inspector Dreyfus (John Cleese taking over acting duties from Kevin Kline) is assembling a team of international experts and detectives to track down the thief and recover the missing artifacts. The latest addition to the crack team is Inspector Jacques Clouseau (Martin), the intrepid yet awkward French detective who always seems to get his man. Jean Reno and Emily Mortimer reprise their roles as Clouseau's partner, Ponton, and love interest, Nicole, respectively, with Andy Garcia, Alfred Molina, Yuki Matsuzaki, and the Bollywood beauty Aishwarya Rai rounding out the team that will travel from Paris to Rome in search of the priceless gem(n)

programme.title: Paul Blart: Mall Cop 2
programme.desc: Accomplished mall security guard Paul Blart discovers a heist plot while attending an expo in Las Vegas. His investigative prowess is needed to foil the robbery and arrest those responsible(n)

But when nobody believes her story -- with the possible exception of a police detective who seems mildly curious (Susan Sarandon) -- she decides to investigate the crime herself. Written and directed by Kevin Kaufman(n)

programme.title: Rebound
programme.desc: Steve Carr's comedy stars Martin Lawrence as Roy McCormick, a basketball coach with anger issues who eventually ends up facing a lengthy ban. His agent suggests a little humility might lessen the blow and gets him a job coaching the Smelters, probably the worst school team in town. At first despairing of a team who can't catch, pass or shoot, McCormick licks them into shape. But on the eve of their big match, he receives an offer to return to top level coaching. Will he take the offer or stay with the Smelters in their hour of need?(n)

programme.desc: In this chilling psychological thriller, U.S. Marshal Teddy Daniels investigates the disappearance of a killer at a mental asylum located on an island currently in the path of a major hurricane. As Teddy's investigation continues, he suspects the asylum's doctors are performing dangerous experiments and he begins to fear that there might be a supernatural presence on the island(n)

programme.title: Friday the 13th
programme.desc: (2009) Director Marcus Nispel seems to have a bit of a thing for remakes, having remoulded The Texas Chainsaw Massacre in 2003, as well as Conan the Barbarian in 2011. However, in this slasher horror, Nispel compresses elements of the first four films in the Friday the 13th franchise, which started way back in 1980, into one blood-sodden whole. This retread gives some background as to why Jason Voorhees (Derek Mears) became such a relentlessly homicidal maniac, before getting on with the business of steel on flesh and bucketloads of gore, delivering the movie's raison d'être. Some weeks after his sister goes missing, Clay Miller's (Jared Padalecki) search for his sibling leads him to Crystal Lake, a remote, wooded campsite. Also arriving at the spot is a group of young revellers, intent on partying. But it's not long before the man with the hockey mask and machete pays them a visit - one that any survivors are unlikely to forget. Can any of them escape Voorhees' latest murderous rampage? Or will they all vanish like Clay's sister and her friends?(n)

programme.desc: A high school outcast hits back with her destructive telekinetic powers(n)

programme.title: Wes Craven's New Nightmare
programme.desc: Actress Heather Langenkamp is having nightmares about the fictional murderer Freddy Krueger, gradually she earns that the 'Nightmare' movies were protecting the world from a monstrous demon, who has taken on the persona of Freddy and is acting out the events in West Craven's new 'Nightmare' Script as he writes them. And the script doesn't look like it will have a happy ending. Langenkamp, Wes Craven and other associated with the Nightmare on Elm Street series play themselves in this complex, sophisticated thriller(n)

programme.title: Freddy vs. Jason
programme.desc: Forgotten maniac Freddy Krueger comes back to terrorise teens through the body of psycho Jason Voorhees. Then both killers turn on each other. Two horror villains, one film and plenty of dead teens(n)

programme.title: Resident Evil: Retribution
programme.desc: After awakening in a top-secret Umbrella facility, Alice seeks the truth about her origins and scours the planet to find the source of the zombie plague. Along the way, she encounters new allies and discovers a shocking revelation that completely alters her perception of the past(n)

programme.title: Jeepers Creepers 2
programme.desc: After the runaway success of Jeepers Creepers in 2001, it was inevitable there would be a sequel, but this is just as smart and scary as the original. The Creeper has just two days of his allotted 23 on earth left to both eat his fill and replenish body parts that have decayed during his enforced years of hibernation. Fortunately, a broken-down bus full of college basketball players and their cheerleaders should provide for his needs. As the students are picked off one by one, their only hope is local farmer Jack Taggart, who's out to avenge his son's death. Victor Salva's film is satisfyingly full of edge-of-the-seat moments, not to mention the required quota of gruesome deaths and gore(n)

programme.title: Seinfeld
programme.desc: The Postponement. Comedy genius Jerry Seinfeld, along with friend George, ex-girlfriend Elaine and neighbour Kramer, continue to digest the troublesome New York social scene and the general irritating minutiae of life, as season seven of the hit show comes to Sky Atlantic(n)

programme.title: 2 Broke Girls
programme.desc: And the Secret Ingredient. Inspired by Max's cost-cutting techniques, Caroline develops an obsession with couponing, which leads to her inadvertently discovering the secret ingredient Max uses in her cupcakes. Caroline's coupon habit spirals out of control and she forsakes a promised trip to visit Chestnut to go head-to-head with the ultimate Coupon Queen. Meanwhile, Max campaigns against the unjust trebling of the price of sanitary products(n)

programme.title: 2 Broke Girls
programme.desc: And the Upstairs Neighbor. Max and Caroline try to befriend their upstairs neighbour, who Caroline believes is a hooker, so she doesn't rat them out to the landlord for a threatening note(n)

programme.title: Tower Heist
programme.desc: A luxury condo manager leads a staff of service workers to seek payback when the penthouse owner defrauds them out of their pension money. Vowing to make things right, he assembles an unlikely crew of amateur thieves with no real thieving talent and enlists the help of a petty crook to steal 20 million dollars they are sure are hidden in the penthouse. What could possibly go wrong?(n)

programme.title: Married...With Children
programme.desc: Where's the Boss. Al (Ed O'Neill) is wrong when he jumps to the conclusion that his never-seen boss Gary (Geoffrey Scott) has died, but he is right on the money when he concludes that Gary has gone out of his way to avoid him. His gorge rising, Al demands that his boss acknowledge his existence--or he'll quit. The role of Ed is played by veteran character actor Lewis Arquette, the father of actresses Rosanna Arquette and Patricia Arquette(n)

programme.title: Married...With Children
programme.desc: Johnny Be Gone. "You can watch reruns or you can watch Fox" blared the original ads for this, the final episode of Married. . .With Children's first season (ironically, you'd be watching reruns on Fox one week later). The plot is set in motion when Al and Peg learn that their favorite hamburger joint, Johnny B. Goods, is soon to close its doors for good. As the Bundy try to attend the restaurant's last night, they are constantly delayed by the misadventures of their children--and their anxiety spills over to their next-door neighbors Steve (David Garrison) and Marcy (Amanda Bearse), who are planning to throw a party for some VIPs. (This is one of the series' two episodes to be taped in a single, long, continuous "scene")(n)

programme.title: Married...With Children
programme.desc: Poppy's by the Tree. Married. . .With Children launches its second season with the series' first two-part episode (originally networkcast in a single hour-long timeslot). "Borrowing" their neighbors' car, the Bundy family embarks upon a vacation, ending up in a sleazy hotel in Dumpwater, Florida. The town happens to be famous for two things: It's the home of "the man who shook the hand of Andy Griffith", and also the home of a brutal axe murderer who strikes every five years--and specializes in hacking up tourists. As the locals place bets as to who will be the killer's next victims, guess which family strolls into the scene? (Aw, you guessed.)(n)

programme.title: Married...With Children
programme.desc: Poppy's by the Tree. Conclusion. Peg spoils the family's fun when she's kidnapped by the axe murderer(n)

programme.title: Married...With Children
programme.sub-title: If I Were a Rich Man
programme.desc: If I Were a Rich Man. Panic grips the bank where Steve (David Garrison) works when the vault comes up a million dollars short. The Bundy family assumes that their patriarch Al (Ed O'Neill) has snatched the dough during a nocturnal visit to the vault (where he played cards with Steve)--and accordingly, Peg (Katey Sagal) and the kids treat Al like a hero. Basking in all this attention, Al begins to wish that he really was a thief. . .but if that were the case, Season Two of Married. . .With Children would have been over and done with after only three episodes(n)

programme.title: Married...With Children
programme.desc: Buck Can Do It. The Bundys' neighbors are incensed by the "stupid, ugly puppies" that have popped up over the past several months. The blame for this phenomenon is placed on the Bundy's dog Buck, aka "The Carnal Tresspasser." Amidst demands that he neuter the dog, Al Bundy (Ed O'Neill) has a surreal dream in which Buck assumes human form. Christina Applegate (Kelly Bundy) does not appear in this episode, the first to be taped for the series' second season (though not the first to be shown)(n)

programme.title: Married...With Children
programme.desc: Girls Just Wanna Have Fun. Part 1 of 2. A beef with Steve sends Marcy out with Peggy and the girls to a male strip club(n)

programme.title: Married...With Children
programme.desc: Girls Just Wanna Have Fun. In the conclusion of a two-part story (originally telecast as a single hour-long entry), Marcy (Amanda Bearse) despairs over the loss of her wedding ring, which she lost while tipping a male stripper named Zorro (Billy Hufsey) at Troy's strip club. Meanwhile, Zorro shows up at the doorstep of Marcy's neighbor Al (Ed O'Neill) to return the ring. As a result, Al and Marcy's husband Steve (David Garrison) conspire to lay an enormous guilt trip on both their wives--after all, it was Al's spouse Peg (Katey Sagal) who apparently led Marcy astray(n)

programme.desc: Single Spaced. Doug and Carrie consider adopting a baby after they run into friends who recently had a child. Meanwhile, Carrie has secretly kept the Manhattan apartment. Could there be trouble ahead?(n)

programme.title: The Cleveland Show
programme.desc: Brown Magic. To help him bond with his stepson, Cleveland takes Rallo to his first magic show, where they find themselves hired as the opening act. Their ventriloquist performance soon becomes a hit, largely thanks to Rallo's sharp wit in the role of the puppet. However, as rave reviews from fans and critics roll in, the youngster grows tired of Cleveland taking all the credit for their success. programme.title: Seinfeld
programme.desc: The Hot Tub. When Elaine has a long-distance runner (who once accidentally slept in and missed a big race) staying at her apartment while he's in town for the New York Marathon, Jerry becomes obsessed with making sure the runner wakes up on time. Meanwhile, Elaine struggles to overcome a bad case of writer's block and Kramer installs a hot tub in his apartment. Jeremiah Birkett and Leon Russom guest star and series co-creator Larry David once again appears as the voice of George Steinbrenner. Originally airing October 19, 1995, " The Hot Tub" was the fifth episode of the show's seventh season(n)

programme.title: Charmed
programme.desc: Oh My Goddess!. In the first half of Charmed's fifth-season finale (originally telecast as a single two-hour episode), the mythical Titans are released from their eternal prison, whereupon they wipe out all the Whitelighter Elders -- leaving only Leo (Brian Krause) in charge. While Leo is thus occupied, a mysterious Whitelighter from the future is assigned as guardian angel for the Charmed Ones. Somehow, this results in the three girls being transformed into Greek goddesses: Piper (Holly Marie Combs) is the Goddess of Earth, Phoebe (Alyssa Milano) is the Goddess of Love, and Paige (Rose McGowan) is the Goddess of War!(n)

programme.title: Charmed
programme.desc: Oh My Goddess!. In the concluding half of Charmed's fifth-season finale (originally telecast as a single two-hour episode), the Charmed Ones must adjust to their newfound powers as Greek Goddesses without becoming seduced by those powers. As an added burden, the girls are obliged to vanquish the Titans, who have killed all existing Whitelighter Elders. As the story rushes to its cliffhanger climax, surviving Whitelighter Leo (Brian Krause) is given a choice: should he become the head elder, or remain with his wife, Piper (Holly Marie Combs), and his baby, Wyatt? Among other things, this episode marks the emergence of a new major Charmed character: mercurial Whitelighter Chris Perry, played by Drew Fuller(n)
